Australia:Cardinal Pell yahanishijwe igifungo cy’imyaka 6 kubera gusambanya abana
, March 2019
“Cardinal” George Pell wari umwe mu bajyanama bakomeye ba Papa Francis, yahanishijwe igifungo cy’imyaka itandatu, ni nyuma yuko ahamijwe ibyaha byo gusambanya abana babiri b’abahungu muri Australia.
Mu Ukuboza 2018 nibwo Pell w’imyaka 77 yahamijwe gusambanyiriza aba bana mu byumba bya Katederali ya Melbourne mu 1996. Niwe muyobozi Mukuru muri Kiliziya Gatolika uhamijwe ibyaha nk’ibi.
Urubanza rwe rwabaye inshuro ebyiri kubera ko ubwa mbere itsinda ry’abanyamategeko ryari ryananiwe kumvikana, ku nshuro ya kabiri baje kumuhamya icyaha cyo gusambanya umwana w’umuhungu uri munsi y’imyaka 16 n’ibindi bine byo gukorera ibikorwa by’urukozasoni ku bana babiri bataruzuza imyaka y’ubukure.
Mu mwaka wa mbere akigirwa Musenyeri wa Melbourne ngo Pell yasanze abana babiri b’abahungu muri kimwe mu byumba bya Kiliziya, icyo gihe misa yari ihumuje
Nyuma yo kubabwira ko bari mu byago kuko banyweye divayi ikoreshwa mu Kiliziya yabategetse gukora ibikorwa by’urukozasoni. Umwe muri aba bana niwe watanze ubuhamya, undi bari kumwe we hashize igihe yitabye Imana.
- Cardinal Pell niwe muyobozi mukuru muri Kiliziya uhanishijwe igifungo kubera ibyaha byo gusambanya abana

Mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka ni bwo FERWAFA yemeje ko ingengo y’imari ya 2021 izaba ingana na 6,364,175,639 Frw.
Aya yose yavuye muri miliyari 6.58 Frw yateganyijwe, ariko hakaba harakuwemo miliyoni 152,475 Frw azakoreshwa mu 2022 mu mupira w’abagore na miliyoni 69.595 Frw azishyurwa mu rwego rwo kugabanya imyenda iri shyirahamwe rifite.
Amafaranga FERWAFA yateganyije azava he?
FERWAFA yatangiye uyu mwaka wa 2021 ifite kuri konti ibihumbi 710$ (angana na miliyoni 695.8 Frw) arimo ibihumbi 500$ yata
... 
na miliyari 1.395 Frw ku makipe y’igihugu.
Amafanga yose azakoreshwa gute?
Ingengo y’imari ya FERWAFA mu 2021 igabanyije mu bice bibiri birimo miliyoni 723.82 Frw zizajya mu miyoborere na serivisi zitandukanye zayo mu gihe asaga miliyari 5.6 Frw asigaye azajya mu guteza imbere umupira w’Amaguru.
Muri uku guteza imbere umupira, miliyoni 10 Frw zizashyirwa mu gushyiraho gahunda ihamye y’iterambere rya ruhago y’abagore mu gihe gutegura amarushanwa y’abana bari munsi y’imyaka 13, 15 na 17, bizatwara
...
.17 Frw) mu gihe andi ari agenewe amahugurwa atandukanye bahabwa.

Kuwa Gatanu, tariki 7 Ukwakira APR FC yatsinzwe umukino w'ikirarane wayihuje na Bugesera FC, benshi mu bafana bayo bababazwa no kubura amanota mu gihe mukeba Rayon Sports we ameze neza.
Gutsindwa na Bugesera FC, byaje bikurikiye undi mukino wa Shampiyona APR FC yatsinzemo Rwamagana FC bigoranye mu mpera z'icyumweru gishize, bikomeza gushyira akabazo ku musaruro wayo w'ahazaza.
Iyi mikino yombi kandi yabaye nyuma y'uko ikipe y'ingabo z' u Rwanda iherutse gusezererwa mu marushanwa Nyafurika ya CAF
... 
a bahuriye mu ijonjora rya mbere.
Umusaruro utanejeje umaze iminsi muri APR FC niwo Lt Gen Mubarakh yavuzeho, asaba imbabazi abafana mu gihe ikipe igishaka umuti urambye uzazana umusaruro mwiza.
Mu butumwa yohereje kuri Radio Rwanda, yagize ati "Nsabye imbabazi abakunzi ba APR FC ko tutarabaha ibyishimo tubagomba mu mikino myinshi itambutse, kandi turi gushaka igisubizo cyabo kirambye."
APR FC ntabwo yorohewe
Nubwo APR FC imaze imyaka itatu yikurikuranya ku gutwara igikombe cya Shampiyona, abafa
...
abona kuko badasiba kwerekana ko bakeneye kugera mu matsinda y'imikino Nyafurika.
Uretse ibyo kandi, benshi mu bafana bagaragaza ko ubusatirizi bwa APR FC bukeneye kongerwamo abakinnyi b'abanyamahanga mu rwego rwo kubona ibitego byinshi, nubwo ubuyobozi bukomeza gushimangira ko gahunda ari ugukoresha abakinnyi b'abanyarwanda.
APR FC izagaruka mu kibuga kuwa 12 Ukwakira 2022, aho izakirira Marine FC kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo, mu mukino uzatangira i Saa Cyenda z'amanywa (15:00).

Ikipe ya Table Tennis (Ping Pong) ya Gasabo yateguye irushanwa rya mbere ry’uyu mwaka rizaba tariki ya 22 Mutarama 2017 mu rwego rwo kubyutsa uyu mukino usa n’ugiye kuzima mu Rwanda.
Iri rushanwa rizahuza abantu b’ibyiciro bitandukanye, rikazabera mu nyubako ya Komite y’Igihugu y’Imikino y’abafite ubumuga (NPC Gymnasium) kuri Sitade Amahoro i Remera nk’uko ikinyamakuru izubarirashe.rw kibikesha Bahati Innoc, umuyobozi w’ikipe ya Gasabo ya Table Tennis.
Intego y’iri rushanwa
Innoc Bahati mu kigan
... 
he.rw yagize ati “iri rushanwa rigamije, kubyutsa umukino wa Table tennis usa nk’uwazimiye mu bakunzi bawo, kumenya abakinyi uko bahagaze(niveau y’umukino), gusabana kw’abakinyi bari hirya hino mu gihugu biciye mu mukino (bakamenyana), gusoza vacances (ibiruhuko) neza ku bana basubiye ku ishuri”.
Ese kuba MINISPOC yarahagaritse amarushanwa ategurwa n’Ishyirahamwe rya Table Tennis mu Rwanda ikipe ya Gasabo yaba yerewe kugira ugikorwa ikora?
Umuyobozi wa Gasabo Table Tennis Club mu gusubiza iki ki
...
tion yarahagaritswe ntibyatubuza ko dutegura iri rushanwa kuko iyi ni Club yariteguye, ikindi na none nuko twabimenyesheje Ministeri ishinzwe siporo (MINISPOC) iby’iri rushanwa basanga ntakibazo”.
Bahati atangaza ko uwiyandikisha agomba kugaragaza icyiciro (Category) ashaka gukiniramo nk’abari munsi y’imyaka 18, guhera ku myaka 18 kugeza ku myaka 35 (Seniors) no guhera ku myaka 35 kuzamuka (Veterans).
Buri bakinnyi batatu ba mbere muri buri cyiciro bazahembwa ibihembo bitandukanye.

Muri Uganda hagaragaye umurwayi wa Ebola nyuma y’imyaka 10 iki cyorezo byemejwe ko cyacitse.
Uwasanganywe ibimenyetso by’iyi ndwara, ni umugabo w’imyaka 24, ndetse Ebola ihita imuhitana nk’uko byemejwe inzego z’ubuzima muri iki gihugu.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yabwiye itangazamakuru ko uyu mugabo yatahuweho ibimenyetso bya Ebola mbere y’uko imuhitana.
Ubusanzwe yari atuye mu gace ka Ngabano, mu Karere ka Mubende ni muri kilometero 147 uvuye i Kampala.
Amakuru avuga ko hari abandi bantu umunani, bakekwaho kugaragaza ibimenyetso bya Ebola, ariko ko bari kwitabwaho n’abaganga.
Ikugo cy’Ubushakashatsi kuri virus muri Uganda ndetse n’Ishami ry’Umiryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima, WHO/OMS, byemeje ko kuri ubu iyi virus ifite inkomoko muri Sudani.
Iyi virus yaherukaga kugaragara mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba mu 2012.
Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’Umiryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima muri Uganda, OMS, Dr Matshidiso Moeti yashimiye inzego zitandukanye uburyo zatahuye iyi ndwara itarakwirakwira.
Urwaye Ebola agira umuriro, ababara umutwe, aribwa mu ngingo, mu muhogo, agacika intege, agacibwamo, akaruka cyane kandi kenshi.
- Advertisement -
Mu bindi bimenyetso agaragaza harimo kuribwa mu nda no kuva amaraso ahantu hose hari umwenge ku mubiri.

Perezida Paul Kagame yakiriye Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Uganda, Sam Kutesa, wari ufite ubutumwa bwihariye bwa Perezida Yoweri Museveni nk’uko Ambasade ya Uganda mu Rwanda yabitangaje.
Ntihatangajwe imiterere y’ubwo “butumwa bwihariye” Museveni yoherereje Perezida Paul Kagame kuri uyu wa Kane.
Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ya Uganda yifashishije Twitter, yatangaje ko “baganiriye ku bibazo bireba ibihugu byombi kandi bakiyemeza gukorera hamwe hagamijwe gushimangira no kwagura ubutwere
... 
na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, Dr Sezibera Richard n’uwo yasimbuye Mushikiwabo Louise, uheruka kugirwa Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Umuryango w’Ibihugu bivuga Ururimi rw’Igifaransa (OIF).
Uguhura kw’aba bombi kuje nyuma y’igihe hari Abanyarwanda bafatirwa muri Uganda ku mpamvu zidasobanutse, bagafungwa ndetse bagakorerwa iyicarubozo, bakaza kurekurwa ariko abandi bakaba bagifunze.
Uheruka ni uwitwa Niyigena Patrick w’imyaka 38, usanzwe akora ubucuruzi, wabanje gushimutirwa muri Uganda
...
iriye na Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa Uganda ku bibazo by’umutekano n’imibanire irimo agatotsi ivugwa hagati y’ibihugu byombi, iterambere n’ibindi biri mu nyungu z’ibihugu byombi.
Museveni yavuze ko mu ntangiriro z’umwaka ubwo yahuriraga na Perezida Kagame i Addis Ababa, yamugaragarije urutonde rw’ibimenyetso ko hari Abanyarwanda bafungiye muri Uganda, agira ati “Uyu munsi nabisubije byose.”
Ku kibazo cy’umubano ukonje, Museveni yavuze ko gishingiye ku kutavugana no kudakorana bya hafi.
MUHABURA.RW

Perezida wa Reta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika yifatiye mu gahanga abashingamateka b’abademokrate hamwe n’ibinyamakuru yongera ashavurira abategetsi bo muri reta yiwe bafashije uwashize ahabona ivyo yakoze vyo gukoresha ububasha nk’umukuru w’igihugu ku nyungu ziwe bwite, kugira azotahukane intsinzi mu matora.
Ni mu gihe umukuru w’inama nshingamateka, Nancy Pelosi yuguruje ku mugaragaro amatohoza ku vyaha Donald Trump akekwako, vyotuma aregwa, akaburana, yagiriwe n’ivyaha agakurwa ku butegetsi, Impeachment mu congereza.
Trump yagarutse i Washington ejo kuwa kane inyuma y’imisi ari i New York mu nama ya buri mwaka ihuza ibihugu bigize ONU.
Yatahutse ku musi nyene komite y’inama nshingamateka ikurikirana ivy’iperereza iriko irabaza umuyobozi w’ikigo kijejwe iperereza muri Amerika ku catumye reta iteba kurungikira kongere ivyavuzwe n’uwashize ahabona ivyakozwe na Trump.
Trump yagirizwa ko mu kwezi kwa ndi itariki 25 guterefonye perezida wa Ukraine amusaba gutohoza ku wahoze ari visi perezida Joe Biden n’umuhungu wiwe, kugira bimwononera gutsinda amatora yo mu 2020.

Akabi gasekwa nk’akeza Liverpool yahawe isomo rya ruhago n’ikipe ntoya abenshi bifata ku gahanga
Kugeza ubu ntabwo byoroshye muri shampiyona y’igihugu y’u Bwongereza Premier League kuko ubwo hakinwaga umukino w’umunsi wa 17 ikipe ya Liverpool yahawe isomo rya ruhago itsindwa na Brentford ibitego 3-1 benshi barumirwa.
Liverpool yatsinzwe uyu mukino nyamara yahabwaga amahirwe akomeye yo kwegukana amanota 3 kugirango ikomeze kwiruka inyuma y’imyanya 4 ya mbere dore ko bikigoranye kuri iyi kipe nyuma y’igenda rya Sadio Mane.
Nyuma yo gutakaza uyu mukino Liverpool igatsindwa ibitego 3-1 umutoza Jurgen Klopp yatangaje ko yumiwe ndetse ngo ntacyo yarenza kubyabaye.

Mu byemezo biheruka Umucamanza Meron yafashe bikanengwa na benshi birimo kurekura Ferdinand Nahimana nk’umwe mu bashinze Radio RTLM yabibye urwango n’amatwara ya Jenoside wari warakatiwe imyaka 30 na Padiri Rukundo wahoze ari Aumônier Militaire mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda, wari warakatiwe imyaka 23.
Hari kandi kugira abere abafatwa nk’abacuze umugambi wa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi nka Zigiranyirazo Protais, Mugenzi Justin, Mugiraneza Prosper, Gen. Ndindiriyimana Augustin, Major Nzuwonemeye Françoi
... 
ra no mu bikorwa jenoside, sinzi niba umuntu yabyita amategeko cyangwa kwikorera ibyo umuntu ashatse nta nkomyi.”
Senateri Makuza yavuze ko ibyemezo bya Meron ari agahomamunwa kuko binakorwa mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko.
Yagize ati “Nibwira rero ko ari ikibazo tugomba guhagurukira tukakigaragaza kuko ubutabera ntabwo ari umuntu ubugaraguza agatoki uko yifuza, hari amategeko n’amahame mpuzamahanga twemera kuko turi no mu muryango mpuzamahanga ufite amategeko ugenderaho ndetse n’areba by’umwi
...
ite imyaka 88 ariho arasaba kongererwa manda y’indi myaka ibiri kuko manda ye irangirana na Kamena uyu mwaka. Gusa anengwa kwirengagiza inshingano yahawe zo guhiga, gufata no gucira imanza abantu bagishakishwa n’urukiko barimo ba Kabuga, Maj. Mpiranya, Minisitiri Bizimana Augustin n’abandi.
Urukiko rwa Arusha rwaciye imanza 75, muri zo abantu 14 bagizwe abere 61 bahamwa n’ibyaha muri abo 16 bamaze kurekurwa batarangije ibihano harimo abari bashigaje igihano cy’imyaka irenga 15.

Guverinoma y’ u Rwanda yavuze ko abanenze u Rwanda kuba rugiye gushora miliyoni z’ amayero mu kwamamaza ubukerarugendo binyuze ku ikipe y’ Arsenal batifuriza u Rwanda iterambere.
Mu nta ngiriro z’ iki cyumweru nibwo Leta y’ u Rwanda yatangaje ko yasinyanye n’ ikipe ya Arsenal amasezerano ngo ige yambara imyenda iriho ‘Sura u Rwanda’ (visit Rwanda) mu rwego rwo kwamamaza ubukerarugendo mu Rwanda. Ni amasezerano y’ imyaka 3 azarangira mu mpera mu mwaka wa 2021. Amakuru ataremezwa n’ inzego bireba 
... 
 bayanenga bavuga ko u Rwanda nk’ igihugu cyakira inkunga nyinshi z’ amahanga ngo ntirwagashoye amafaranga agana kuriya.
Abadepite b’ Ubuholandi basabye Minisitiri ushinzwe inkunga Sigrid Kaag gusuzuma ibyayo masezerano u Rwanda rwagiranye na arsenal
Aba badepite ngo bashaka kumenya ukuntu igihugu giterwa inkunga n’ Ubuholandi gifite ubushobozi bwo gushyigikira ikipe na £30m.
Mu butumwa yanyujije kuri Twitter, Akamanzi yasobanuye impamvu u Rwanda rwahisemo kwamamaza ubukerarugendo bwarwo anamara
...
sobanukiwe ko muri buri bizinesi yose, amafaranga yo kwimenyekanisha ari ingenzi mu gishoro.”
Yakomeje agira ati ““Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe iterambere rwinjiza amafaranga menshi avuye mu bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo, muri ayo ni ho rukura ayo gukomeza kumenyekanisha ibikorwa byago kugira ngo umusaruro wiyongere”.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa RDB avuga ko u rwanda rushaka gukuba kabiri umusaruro uva mu bukerarugendo ukava kuri miliyoni 404 z’ amadorali ukagera kuri miliyoni 800 z’ amadorali bitarenze 2024

Afrika y'epfo yatoye ubundi bwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 mu gihugu. Ubwo bwoko bushasha bwitwa B.1.1.529 bwahindaguritse incuro nyinshi. Abahinga mu bumenyi batangaza ko biteye impungenge kubera bishobora gutuma abasirikare b’umubiri badashobora kuburwanya kandi bwandukira kurushiriza.
Ibimenyetso vya mbere bivuye mu biro bikora ibipimo ku ndwara n’imigera vyerekana ko ubwo bwoko bushasha bwiyongeye n’ingoga mu ntara ibamwo abantu benshi ya Gauteng. Bushobora kuba buza bumaze kugera mu zindi ntara 8 zigize Afrika y’epfo.
Ubwo bwoko bushasha B.1.1.529 buza kandi bwatowe muri Botswana na Hong Kong. Uwasanganywe ubwo bwoko muri iyo ntara ni umuntu yari avuye muri Afrika y’epfo.
Abahinga mu bumenyi bavuga ko abantu bashasha bagera ku bice 90 kw’ijana bandura mu ntara ya Gauteng bashobora kuba bafise ubwoko bw’umugera mushasha bwa B.1.1.529.
Abo bahinga bariko baragerageza kumenya vyinshi ku vyerekeye ubwo bwoko bushasha n’inkurikizi bushobora kugira. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y’abantu, Joe Phaahla, avuga ko hakiri kare kugira bimenyekane niba reta izofata ingingo zikomeye mu ntumbero y’ukwishura kuri ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19. (Reuters)

Wayne Rooney yahanwe imyaka ibiri adatwara imodoka, nyuma yo kwemera ko yatwaye imodoka yasinze.
Rutahizamu wa Everton kandi yahawe amezi 12 y'igihano nsimburagifungo, n'amasaha 100 atishyurwa nyuma yo kujya imbere y'urukiko rwa Stockport Magistrates.
Ndasaba imbabazi umuryango wanjye, umutoza, abayobozi n'abandi bose bo muri Everton FC. Ndasaba imbabazi abafana bose n'undi wese wankurikiye akanamfasha mu buzima bwanjye.
"Nibyo! ndemera imyanzuro y'urukiko kandi ndizera ko nshobora gutanga amand
... 
 kubera imirimo azakora yo gufasha abakeneye ubufasha. Nubwo abacamanza bavuze ko batanyuzwe, kumuha igihano kiremereye byose ngo byagira ubusobanuro bumwe.
Rooney kandi yategetswe kwishyura amapawundi 85, dore ko yari yanyweye birengeje urugero kuri Microgrammes 104 kuri Millilitres 100 mugihe ibyemeye mu bwongereza no muri Wales ari Microgrammes 53 kuri Millilitres 100. Rooney akaba ari inshuro ya gatatu yitaba urukiko.
Rooney w'imyaka 31, akaba yabuze icyo atangaza ubwo itangazamakuru ryamweg
...
e n'abamuba hafi.
Rooney yahanwe nyuma yo guhagarikwa atwaye Volkswagen Beetle muri Wilmslow I Cheshire saa munani z'ijoro Tariki ya mbere Nzeri. Rooney yari yahoranye n'umugore bahuriye muri the Bubble Room bar muri Alderley Edge mu ijoro.
Rooney ufite umugore we Coleen utwite n'abana bane, yagarutse kuri Old Trafford ejo hashize ku nshuro ya mbere nyuma yo kuva muri Manchester United yerekeza muri Everton, aho batsindiwe ibitego 4-0 akaza gusimburwa ku munota wa 82 w'umukino.

Wimbledon: Rafael Nadal yatsinzwe urukino rugitangura
mardi 25 Ruheshi 2013
Rafael Nadal afise ibikombe 12 vy’amarushanwa akomeye. Mw’ihiganwa ry’inkino za Tennis rya Wimbledon ribera mu Bwongereza.
Raphael Nadal yatahanye igikombe ca Wimbledon incuro zibiri, yatsinzwe mu ntango mu mikino yugurura iryo higanwa. Uwo mukinyi ava mu gihugu ca Espagne yatsinzwe na Steve Darcis wo mu Bubirigi ku maseti (7-6, 7-6, 6-4).
Rafael Nadal yatsindiye ibikombe 12 mu mahiganwa akomeye ya tennis. Yaheruka no gutsinda ihiganwa rya French Open ribera mu Bufaransa mu ntango z’uku kwezi.
Iyi n’incuro ya mbere atsindwa mu nkino zugurura ayo mahiganwa.
Floxella Karire

Igihugu ca Cameroon yaciriye igihano co gupfa abarwanyi 89 b’umutwe w’iterabwoba wo muri Nigeria, Boko Haram.
Abo barwanyi baciriwe igihano co gupfa na sentare ya gisirikare kubera uruhara bagize mu bitero vyabereye mu Majaruguru ya Cameroon, agace gahana urubibe na Nigeria.
Abo 89 baciriwe urubanza muri 850 batawe muri yompi muri Cameron, bagirizwa gukorana na Boko Haram.
Kuva igihugu ca Cameroun cemeza itegeko rishiraho igihano c’urupfu mu kurwanya iterabwoba, niryo rya mbere gihanishijwe abagirijwe iterabwoba.

Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe y’umupira w’amaguru ikina mukiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda APR FC, mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 28 Kamena 2019 bwashyize hanze urutonde rw’abakinnyi 16 basezerewe burundu barimo uwari Kapiteni wayo, Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste( miggy).
Impamvu yatangajwe n’ubuyobozi bw’Ikipe ya APR FC ku isezererwa rya burundu( kwirukanwa) kw’aba bakinnyi ngo ni uko bari bamaze iminsi nta musaruro ushimishije batanga mu ikipe.
Iki cyemezo kije kandi nyuma y’aho iyi kipe ya APR FC iburiye igikombe cya shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru 2019-2020, aho cyatwawe na mukeba wayo Rayon Sports FC. Ni nyuma kandi yo kwisanga isezerewe mu mikino y’igikombe cy’Amahoro.
Inama yafatiwemo icyemezo cyo gusezerera burundu aba bakinnyi yabereye ku cyicaro cya APR FC, iyoborwa n’umuyobozi wungirije w’iyi kipe Maj.Gen Mubaraka Muganga aho yashimiye abakinnyi basezerewe umurava bagaragaje mu gihe bakiniye iyi kipe.
Ubuyobozi bwa APR FC bubinyujije ku rubuga rw’iyi kipe bwatangaje kandi ko mu rwego rwo gukora impinduka muri iyi kipe, bugiye gutangaza abandi bakinnyi bazasimbura abasezerewe mbere y’uko iki cyumweru kirangira.
Munyaneza Theogene / intyoza.com

Abanyeshure biga muri kaminuza za Reta bizeye ko umushikiranganji w’amashure ya kaminuza n’ubushakashatsi ahava afata ingingo yo guhagarika rya tegeko risubirwamwo itangwa ry’agafashanyo, kandi yongere afute ingingo yo kwirukana abanyeshure batanu baserukira abandi.
Ikiringo c’ukwiyandikisha kuri banyeshure biga muma kaminuza ya Reta caheze kuri uwu wa gatanu igenekerezo rya 11 Ndamukiza. Gushika n’ubu, ibitigiri vy’abitavye akamo ko kuja kwiyandikisha ntikirashirwa ahabona n’abasanzwe babijejwe
... 
makaminuza ya Reta afise ibitigiri vy’abanyeshure barenga ibihumbi cumi n’umunani.
Gushika n’ubu, abo banyeshure basaba umushikiranganji guhagarika ingingo zibiri arizo, itegeko ry’umushikiranganji ryo kuwa 12 Ruhuhuma nimero 610/212, hamwe n’itegeko ry’umukuru w’igihugu nimero 100/07 ryo kuwa 14 Nzero, yose asubiramwo itangwa ry’agafashanyo, nk’uko bishikirizwa na Epitas Ndayambaje, umwe mu basanzwe baserukira abo banyeshure.
Abo banyeshure babandanya basaba gufuta ingingo yafashwe n’umushikira
...
aca basubira mu mashure, hama ibiganiro bibe mugabo izo ngingo zahagaritswe, nk’uko Epitas Ndayambaje abandanya abishikiriza.
Gushika n’ubu, bararindiriye ico umushikiranganji ahava ashikiriza.

Ruhango: Rutagengwa wavugwagaho kwigamba gutwika imodoka ya Gitifu yabiteye utwatsi
Bwana Rutagengwa Alexis wavugagwaho igikorwa cyo gutwika imodoka ya Gitifu, yabihakanye avuga ko mu gihe iyo modoka yashyaga we yari mu kandi Karere.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa gatatu ikinyamakuru Indorerwamo.com cyabagejejeho inkuru y’umugabo uzwi ku izina rya Rutagengwa Alexis bivugwa ko yatwitse imodoka y’umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Ruhango, mu Karere ka Ruhango nyuma y’aho Gitifu ashenye inzu 
... 
ko asize atwise imodoka ya Gitifu.
Bimwe mu bihamya by’uko Alexis ariwe washumise imodoka ya Gitifu.
Nubwo nta rundi rwego rwego rushinzwe guhamya umuntu icyaha usibye inkiko gusa mu Rwanda, ariko hari bimwe mu bimenyetso bigaragaza ko Alexis ariwe wagize uruhare rutaziguye mu itwikwa ry’imodoka ya Gitifu.
Ubwo twakoraga ino nkuru muri iki gitondo, umwe mu baturage bacururiza hafi y’aho BK ikorera (Kuko ari naho imodoka ya Gitifu yari iparitse) mu Ruhango yagize ati:”…uriya mugabo ni umushoferi 
...
atumye ahunga, maze agira ati:”…nibyo koko nahunze kubera ko numvaga nshinjwa icyo gikorwa nkatinya ko hari uwangirira nabi”
Ku kuba ariwe watwitse imodoka y’umuyobozi, Bwana Alexis yavuze ko atariwe kuko umunsi ibyo biba we yari yibereye mu Karere ka Nyanza, Akarere gahana imbibe n’Akarere ka Ruhango, yagize ati:”...Ibyo Biba rwose jye nari ndi mu Karere ka Nyanza mu kazi, amakuru yo gusenyerwa ninaho nayumviye, abo bose ibyo bavuga ko arijye bazazane ibimenyetso binshinja”

Espérance FC inaniwe kwisobanura na Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle nyuma yo kunganya ibitego 2-2 ku munsi wa mbere wa shampiyona y’icyiciro cya kabiri mu Rwanda.
Abakinnyi batsindiye ikipe ya Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle ni Bizimana Omar na Ndayisenga Thierry.
Abakinnyi batsindiye ikipe ya Espérance ni Tchuma Amini na Nkurunziza Seth.
Lomami Marcel umutoza w’ikipe ya Espérance FC avuga ko kuba batangiye umukino wa mbere banganya atari bibi kuko amakipe aba agitinyana ndetse atarinjira neza muri shampiyona nyirizina.
Avuga ko uko iminsi ikomeza gushira niko abakinnyi bazakomeza kumenyerana kuko ubu bongeyemo abakinnyi bashya.
Isumael umutoza w’ikipe ya Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle avuga ko kuba babashije kubona inota rimwe bibatera imbaraga zo gukomeza guhatana kugira ngo babashe kongera amanota.
Umukino uzaba kuwa gatandatu tariki ya 7 Ugushyingo 2015
Gasabo United FC v Intare FC
Imikino izaba ku cyumweru tariki ya 8 Ugushyingo 2015
Sorwathe FC v Unity FC
Gitikinyoni FC v Vision FC
UNR FC v Hope FC
L a Jeunesse FC v United Stars.
Iyi shampiyona yatangiye kuri uyu wa Gatanu gizwe n’amakipe 24 y’icyiciro cya kabiri mu mupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda.
Ikipe ya Bugesera Fc niyo yegukanye igikombe cya shampiyona umwaka ushize ihita izamuka mu cyiciro cya mbere.

Abimukira batanu barasiwe mw'itana mu mitwe i Calais
Abajejwe intwaro mu Bufaransa bavuga ko n'imiburiburi abimukira batanu barasiwe mw'itana mu mitwe hagati y'abaturuka muri Afuganistani na Eritrea ku kivuko ca Calais.
Umugabo w'imyaka 37 aturuka muri Afuganistani ngo niwe yoba yarashe mu bantu bari batonze barindiriye guhabwa ibifungugwa.
Abanya Eritrea bane bafise imyaka iri hagati ya 16 na 18 bahakomerekeye, muri kino gihe bakaba baremvye.
Amajana y'abimukira bariyongeye muri ico kibanza, ba
... 
njiza abimukira mu Bwongereza biciye muri iyo migwano.
Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC, Hugh Schofield, akorera i Paris yavuze ko ino midugararo ari iya mbere mibi ibaye mu bimukira b'i Calais mu mezi menshi arangiye, ikoresha ry'ibigwanisho bicira umuriro rikaba riteye amakenga.
Ayo makimbirane yatanguye gute?
Ntawuramenya neza icayatanguje ariko hari abantu batanye mu mitwe mu makaritiye yo mu bumanuko bw'igisagara ku munsi wa kane, igihe abimukira bari batonze barindiriye guhabwa indya.
Ico gihe aba
...
mahinguriro hirya ku birometero bitanu, abanya Eritrea bari hagati y'i 150 na 200 bafise ivyuma hamwe n'ibibando bagwana n'abanya Afuganistani 20.
Ku muhingamo ayandi makimbirane yaradutse mu kibanza batangiramwo ibifungugwa i Calais, hafi y'ikambi bita "ishamba".
Abajejwe umutekano baciye barungikwa muri ako karere, rino joro ryarangiye rikaba ryari ritekanye.
AFP yabandanije ivuga ko muri rusangi, abantu 22 ari bo bakomeretse, bamwe muri bo bakaba bafise ibikomere bituruka ku guterwa imbugita.

Arsene Wenger arashinja Barcelone na Manchester City kumusenyera ikipe.
Umutoza wa Arsenal, Arsene Wenger yatangarije ikinyamakuru The Telegram ko kuba ikipe ye idatwara ibikombe biterwa n’amakipe nka Manchester City na FC Barcelone zihora zimutwarira abakinnyi zibashukisha amafaranga.
Arsene Wenger ababazwa cyane n’ukuntu abakinnyi be bagurwa n’aya makipe mu gihe bageze mu myaka yo kuba bamufasha gutwara igikombe.
Umwaka ushize ikipe ya Arsenal yatakaje abakinnyi batatu bari bayifatiye runini aribo Cesc Fabregas wagiye muri FC Barcelone na Samir Nasri hamwe na Gael Clichy berekeje muri Manchester City.
Uyu musaza w’imyaka 62 yagize ati: “ rimwe na rimwe abantu bagerageza gusenya akazi k’abandi, natakaje Fabregas, Nasri na Clichy mu gihe bashoboraga kugira icyo bahindura”.
Tubibutse ko aya makipe yatunze agatoki ari nayo yavanye abakinnyi nka Kolo Toure, Adebayor na Thierry Henry muri Arsenal ndetse zikaba zifuza kongeraho na Robin Van Persie.
N’ubwo yatakaje aba basore ariko muri iyi minsi Arsenal ikomeje kugura aho imaze kuzana ba rutahizamu babiri Lucas Podolski na Olivier Giroud.
Source: goal.com
Rutaganda Ponny.

Ibiganiro hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda i Kampala byarangiye nta tangazo ryumvikanweho n’impande zombi rigiye ahagaragara, kubera Uganda yabuze ayo icira nayo imira, nyuma y’ibimenyetso simusiga biyishinja gushyigira imitwe y’iterabwoba irwanya u Rwanda.
Nyuma y’icyegeranyo cy’Itsinda ry’Impuguke za LONI kuri Kongo cyasohotse muri Ukuboza 2018 rigaragaza ko umutwe wa P5 uyobowe na Kayumba Nyamwasa wari ufite ingabo muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo ndetse ko abagize uyu mutwe baturuka muri Uganda n’u Burundi,
... 
enze. La Forge yavuzeko, Umukuru w’agateganyo wa FDLR, Victor Byiringiro yabohereje bombi i Kampala kubonana na RNC. Muri iyo nama, Abega yavuzeko bahuye nabo muri RNC aribo Tito, Frank Ntwali ndetse n’uwitwa Rashidi. Bazeye kandi yemeje ko babonanye na Minisitiri Mateke baganiriye ku buryo bagomba guhuza imbaraga na RNC. Abahagarariye Uganda babwiye iri tsinda ko batazi inama hagati ya RNC na FDLR nuko iri tsinda risaba kuvugana na Philemon Mateke, inzego za Uganda zirabashwishuriza zanga ubusa
...
a telefoni yo muri Uganda byagaragaye ko nyirayo yavuganye n’abagabye ibyo bitero mbere na nyuma y’ibyo bitero. Iyo nimero byagaragaye ko ari iya Mateke Philemon, Umunyamabanga wa Leta ya Uganda ushinzwe ubuhahirane n’ibihugu byo mu karere.
Nyuma y’icyo gitero, batatu mu bakigabye bahungiye i Kisoro muri Uganda bahamara igihe gito, nyuma boherezwa mu kigo cya gisirikari cya Makenke i Mbarara, bahava berekeza i Mbuya muri Kampala ku cyicaro cy’Urwego rw’Igisirikari cya Uganda rushinzwe iperereza.

Perezida Ismail Omar Guelleh yatsindiye kongera kuyobora iki gihugu n’amajwi 87% mu matora yabaye mu kwezi gushize kwa Kane.
Iyi ni manda ya kane yikurikiranye yarahiriye kuri iki Cyumweru, akaba yaratangiye kuyobora Djibouti mu mwaka wa 1999 asimbuye nyirarume Hassan Gouled Aptidon.
Uwo bari bahanganye muri aya matora wafatwaga nk’ukomeye ni Omar Elmi Khaire, akaba we yaregukanye amajwi 7%.
VOA ivuga ko hari amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi yakuyemo akayo karenge ntiyirushya ajya mu matora, ubwo yahinduraga icyemezo yari yafashe mbere cyo kutiyamamaza, akavuga ko aziyamamaza.
Turimo kubashyiriramo amafoto menshi ajyanye n’uyu muhango.

Martin Fayulu atemera ivyavuye mu matora muri Congo agiye kwitura ubutungane
Umukandida atavuga rumwe na leta yatsinzwe amatora muri Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo (RD Congo), Martin Fayulu, yafashe ingingo yo kwiyamiriza ivyashikirijwe muri sentare.
Uwundi mukandida atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi, Felix Tshisekedi, niwe yashikirijwe ko yatsinze amatora, mu gihe bivugwa ko yagiranye amasezerano yo gusangira ubutegetsi n'umukuru w'igihugu agiye gusohoka.
Inyuma yaho Félix Tshisekedi atangarijw
... 
a zaduka hirya no hino.
Igipolisi ca Congo cavuze ko abantu batanu aribo bamaze gupfa, mu gihe abapolisi 17 bakomerekeye muri iyo midugararo yo kwiyamiriza intsinzi ya Bwana Tshisekedi.
- Martin Fayulu yahakanye intsinzi ya Tshisekedi
- Ubutegetsi buridogera Ekleziya Katolika kuvyo iherutse gushikiriza
Uwamukurikiye mu majwi Martin Fayulu yemeza ko amajwi yibwe, akaba yafashe ingingo yo kwitwara muri sentare.
Ekleziya Katolika yarungitse abarorerezi 40000 gukurikirana ayo matora mu gihugu cose, 
...
ka igihe akanama kajejwe amatora kazoba kashikirije ibitigiri vya nyuma vy'ivyavuye mu matora.
Bitegekanijwe ko kuri uno wa Gatanu ku mugoroba, akanama ka ONU kajejwe umutekano kw'isi kicarira ikibazo ca Congo.
Ayo matora aheruka gutunganywa muri ico gihugu afise intego yo kurondera umusubirizi wa Perezida Joseph Kabila, amaze imyaka 18 ku butegetsi.
Igihe ivyavuye mu matora vyokwemegwa n'impande zose, buzoba bubaye ubwa mbere ubutegetsi buhererekanijwe mu mategeko kuva igihugu cikukira mu 1960.

Sangwe Armel, bitumwako muri Espoir mu gihugu c’Urwanda.
Ku myaka icumi n’indwi gusa, Sangwe Armel n’umusore w’umurundi akinira umugwi wa Espoir mu gihugu c’Urwanda mw’ihiganwa rikuru rya Basket Ball.
Inyuma y’ugutsinda amanota mirongo itatu n’atanu ( 35pts) mu rukino rwahuza imigwi ya mbere yo muri iryo higanwa Espoir- REG BBC 77-100, vyatumye abakunzi ba Basket Ball, muri ico gihugu bibaza kazoza gakomeye kuri uno musore afise amamuko muri karitiye ya Jabe, hano mu gisagara ca Bujumbura.
Ku my
... 
ise kazoza muri Basket Ball.
Aganira n’ikinyamakuru New Times, yamenyesheje ko amerewe neza cane muri ico gihugu, anamenyesha ko hamwe bishitse ico gihugu kikamwegera ko yogikinira, atankeka yokwitabira ubwo butumire.
“I would absolutely grab the opportunity real quick, no question about that.”
Sangwe Armel, akaba yakinye hano mu Burundi, aho yakiniye umugwi wa Gymkana mu cicaro ca kabiri mu mwaka w’2014, aho barangije mu cicaro ca kabiri, inyuma ya Mutanga United. Abajijwe bamwe mu bakinyi boba
...
se n’abandi.
Mu gihugu c’Urwanda akaba amaze kuharonkera ubushimwe bugera kuri bubir i: Mu mwaka w’2017, yahawe agashimwe k’umukinyi akiri muto yigenjeje neza mw’ihiganwa rikuru rya Basket Ball “best young player of the season”, yongera atorwa nk’umukinyi mwiza w’amashure yisumbuye muri kano karere FEASSA 2017 akinira APE Rugunga.
Muri ico gihugu c’Urwanda, ihiganwa rya Basket Ball, rikaba ririmwo abakinyi b’abarundi batari bake, mu migwi y’abigeme ndetse n’iy’abasore, tutibagiye n’abamenyereza.

Ku wa 4 muri Cote d’Ivoire imirwano yongeye kurota hagati ya guverinoma n’abasirikari bayivumbuyeho.
Abasirikari b’Abafaransa bakurikirana uko agahenge kubahirizwa bavuga ko imirwano yabereye ahitwa Vavoua, mu burengerazuba, ubwo ingabo za guverinoma zarengeraga ibirindiro by’abasirikari bivumbuye muri ako karere. Hari amakuru avuga ko ngo abasirikari ba guverinoma bafite abacanshuro babafasha kurwana.
Imirwano yadutse nyuma y’aho impande zombi ziteraniye amagambo ku wa 3, zishinjanya kurenga ku gahenge.
Hagati aho, undi mutwe uvuga ko ushyigikiye general Robert Guei wishwe imirwano igitangira mu kwezi kwa 9 uvuga ko na wo wigaruriye umugi wa Danane, mu majyaruguru y’uburengerazuba bwa Cote d’Ivoire. Uwo mutwe mushyashya unarwanira no hafi y’umugi wa Man na wo wegereye aho Danane.
General Guei yishwe n’abasirikari ba guverinoma mu masaha ya mbere ya nyuma y’aho abasirikari batangiriye kwivumbura ku itariki 19 z’ukwezi kwa 9.
Imishyikirano i Lome yo ikomeje guseta ibirenge kubera kunanirwa kumvikana ku bibazo byose. Abasirikari bivumbuye barasaba andi matora, na perezida Gbagbo akegura, mu gihe guverinoma ya Cote d’Ivoire yo isaba abo basirikari gushyira intwaro zabo hasi.

Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu, ONU, ryasavye impande zishamiranye muri Libiya guhagarika intambara vyihuta, no kwicara ku meza y’ibiganiro zikavana mu nzira ibizitandukanya.
Akamo ka ONU kaje gakurikira ugutana mu mitwe kwabaye ejo ku wa gatandatu hagati y’ingabo za reta yemewe n’amakungu ikaba ikorera i Tripoli ku murwa mukuru wa Libiya, n’iza Fathi Bashagha, uwo inama nshingamateka ikorera mu buseruko bwa Libiya, ivuga ko ari we mushikiranganji wa mbere w’ico gihugu.
Abamaze kumenyekana ko baguye m
... 
ntu 32, abakomeretse nabo 159. Umushikiranganji w’amagara y’abantu yatanze ibi bitigiri avuga ko amavuriro 6 yamijaguweko ibisasu. Umumenyeshamakuru w’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru y’abafaransa, AFP, nawe yabonye ivyabaye yemeje ko yiboneye imiduga itari mike, n’amazu menshi vyaturiwe.
Ugutana mu mitwe kw’impande zibiri zirwanira ubutegetsi bwa Libiya kwabereye mu ma karitiye atandukanye y’umurwa mukuru Tripoli. Intureka z’ino ncuro ni zo za mbere zikaze gusumba izindi zose zabaye mu myaka ibiri ih
...
a ko uno munsi ku wa Mungu i Tripoli ariko hazindutse hatekanye.
Abdelhamid Dbeibah, umukuru wa Reta y’i Tripoli yemewe n’amakungu, yabonetse muri videwo akikujwe n’ingabo ziwe ariko araziramutsa. Yagirije mukeba wiwe Fathi Bashagha ko we n’abamushigikiye, bariko bagerageza kwigarurira Tripoli ariko bikabata ku w’amazi. Ku rundi ruhande, abajejwe gutanga amakuru mu biro vya Bachagha babwiye umukuru wa Reta y’i Tripoli ko “atemewe n’amategeko naho abandanya kwiyomeka ku butegetsi.”

Umusifuzi w'umunya-Zambia, Janny Sikazwe yakoze ibara mu mukino w'igikombe cy'Afurika wahuje Mali na Tunisia aho yarangije umukino inshuro 2 zose utarangiye.
Wari umukino wo mu itsinda F wabereye mu Mujyi wa Limbe, Mali yafunguye amazamu ku munota wa 48 gitsinzwe na Ibrahim Kone.
Tunisia iba yishyuye iki gitego ku munota wa 74 kuri penaliti yatewe na Wahbo Khazri ariko umunyezamu awukuramo.
Umusifuzi wo hagati Sikazwe yaje gutangura benshi ubwo umukino wari ugeze ku munota wa 85, yahise awusoza.
Yaje gusanga yibeshye maze arawukomeza maze ugeze ku munota wa 89 n'amasegonda 43 yongera kuwusoza.
Abakinnyi n'abatoza ba Tunisia bahise bamwirukiraho bamubaza ukuntu asoje umukino utarangiye ndetse nta n'iminota y'inyongera igiyeho.
Hahise haba inama yemeza ko uyu mukino wongerwaho iminota ibiri ndetse hagakinwa n'amasegonda yari asigaye, ariko Sikazwe akava hagati akaba umusifuzi wa 4, gusa abakinnyi ba Tunisia babyanze maze umukino urangira uko.
Janny Sikazwe na bagenzi be bamufashije kuri uyu mukino bakaba basohotse bacungiwe umutekabo kugira ngo hatagira ubahutaza.

Abel Bizimana akaba ari umuyobozi ku rwego rw’Umurenge uyu munsi ku cyumweru tariki 12 Kanama 2018 ari Mulago Catholic Church yagize ati “Uyu munsi turi hano kugirango twereke Imana ko Gen.Kale Kayihura akwiye gufungurwa”.

... 
mutangaje cyane kubazwa ibyo bibazo bijyanye n’urupfu rwa Kaweesi.

Mu rusengero abantu babwiwe guhaguruka bagasengera ubuzima bwa Kaweesi. ...
yine igiye kumufungura.

Ikinyamakuru cya chimpreports dukesha iyi nkuru kivuga ko gifite amakuru ko ISO basabye Perezida Museveni ukundi kwezi kugirango barangize iperereza ku byaha ashinjwa abone kugezwa mu rukiko cyangwa abonane na Museveni.

Uwahoze ar’Umushikiranganji w’umutekano wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Leon Panetta, yatangaje k’urupfu rw’uwuvukana na Kim Jong Un,Umukuru w’igihugu ca koreya Ya Ruguru, rwerekana ko ata mutekano abategetsi ba Koreya ya Ruguru bafise. Panetta amenyesha ko bihuye n’ivyo bahora bikeka ku bijanye n’ubutegetsi bw’ico gihugu.
Kubwa Panetta ngo bigaragara ko umuntu wese afise ivyiyumviro bidahwanye n’umurongozi wa Koreya ya Ruguru, ashobora kwicwa. Kim Jong Nam, yarafise imyaka mirongo ine n’itanu, yapfuye itariki cumi na zitatu z’uku kwezi kwa kabiri, ahawe uburozi n’abagore babiri bamusanze ku kibuga c’indege co muri Malaisie, I Kuala Lumpur.
Kur’uyu wa gatanu, igipolisi co muri Malaisie catangaje ko uburozi bwahitanye Kim Jong Nam buri mu bwoko bubujijwe bw’ibigwanisho vy’ubamara, Igihugu ca Koreya ya Ruguru kitigeze giterako igikumu. Igipolisi co muri Malasie kimenyesha ko cafashe abagore baregwa kw’aribo bahaye uburozi Kim, kandi ko gitegekanya gukora amatohoza ku bandi bantu indwi baturuka muri Koreya ya Ruguru, harimwo n’umukozi wo mu biro vy’uwuserukira Koreya ya Ruguru muri Malaisie.
ubwo bumara bwishe Kim Jong Nam bwiswe VX Nerve Agent mu congereza nikigwanisho c’ubumara gikomeye cane cakozwe n’abantu ciyamirijwe na ONU. Ubwo bumara ima rimwe ryabwo rirashobora kwica umuntu mu minota mikeye.
Rero ubwo bumara bushobora kuba bwatanguye kwonona ubwonko bwiwe hama aca apfa mu minuta itarenze cumiitanu atwawe kwa Muganga.

Dr Frank Habineza watanzwe n’ishyaka Green Party avuga ko afite icyizere gikomeye cyo gutsinda amatora y’umukuru w’Igihugu cy’u Rwanda, ku kigereranyo cy’amajwi agera kuri 70%. Ngo amatora n’aba mu mucyo azemera ibizava mu matora ari kuba uyu munsi tariki ya 04 Kanama uyu mwaka.
Itegeko riteganya ko nyuma y’iminsi icyenda igikorwa cy’amatora gisojwe hatangazwa bwa nyuma uwegukanye itsinzi ya Perezida wa Repubulika. Frank yatoreye Kimironko ku ishuri ribanza rya Kimironko ya Kabiri.
Aho yatoreye hari abanyamakuru bagera kuri 50, yinjiye mu cyumba cy’itora aherekejwe na bamwe bashakaga gufata amafoto n’amashusho. Yasohotse abwira itangazamakuru ko yizeye gutsinda matora kuko yabonye umubare munini w’abamushyigikiye kuva yatangira.
Yanavuze ko hari indorerezi ze zangiwe gukora kuko ngo hari ibyangombwa batujuje.Ngo bavuganye na Komisiyo y’amatora kuburyo iki kibazo kiza gukemuka mu masaha ari imbere.
Inshingano za Perezida wa Repubulika
Itegeko Nshinga mu ngingo ya 98 rivuga ko “Perezida wa Repubulika ni we Mukuru w’Igihugu. Perezida wa Repubulika ashinzwe kurinda Itegeko Nshinga no kubumbatira ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda.
Perezida wa Repubulika yishingira ko Leta ikomeza kubaho, ubwigenge n’ubusugire bw’Igihugu no kubahiriza amasezerano mpuzamahanga. Perezida wa Repubulika, rimwe mu mwaka, ageza ku Banyarwanda ijambo rigaragaza uko Igihugu gihagaze.”

Ikipe y’igihugu ya Côte d’Ivoire yaraye ibaye iya kabiri ibonye itike ya ½ nyuma yo gutsinda Cameroun ibitego bitatu ku busa ikaba igomba gutegereza ikipe iza gukomeza kuri iki Cyumweru hagati ya Tunisia na Mali naho RD Congo yasezereye u Rwanda ikazahura n’iza kurokoka hagati ya Zambia na Guinnea.
Imikino ibiri ya ¼ yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, iminota 90 y’umukino yagiye irangira nta kipe ibonye intsinzi bityo hakitabazwa iminota 30 y’inyongera.

... 
10 Ernest Sugira yishyura ku munota wa 56 bagiye mu minota 30 y’inyongera ku munota 113 Bompunga ashyiramo icya kabiri ari na cyo cyasezereye u Rwanda.
Mu mukino wa kabiri wabereye kuri Stade ya Huye Côte d’Ivoire yabonye itike nyuma yo gutsinda Cameroun ibitego bitatu ku busa byose byabonetse mu minota 30 y’inyongera nyuma y’uko iminota 90 yagenwe y’umukino yari yarangiye amakipe yombi anganya ubusa ku busa.
Aya makipe agomba gutegereza andi abiri ari bukomeze mu mikino ibiri iteganyijwe uyu mu
...
i Nyamirambo saa cyenda.
Ikipe ya DR Congo izahura muri ½ n’iri bukomeze hagati ya Zambia na Guinnea ku itariki 03 Gashyantare 2016 kuri Stade Amahoro na ho Côte d’Ivoire izahure n’iri bukomeza hagati ya Tunisia na Mali tariki 04 Gashyantare 2016 kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo.
Umukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cya CHAN 2016 uzaba tariki 07 Gashyantare 2016 saa kumi n’ebyiri n’igice kuri Stade Amahoro ubanzirizwe n’uwo guhatanira umwanya wa gatatu ku makipe azaba yatsinzwe muri ½.

Kuri uyu wa gatatu, uhagarariye Ishyirahamwe Maison Shalom rirera abana b'impfubyi, Marguerite Barankitse yabwiye Ijwi ry'Amerika ko yatunguwe n’amakuru yemeza ko ikicaro cy’iryo shyirahamwe cyari mu ntara ya Ruyigi cyafashwe n’irindi shyirahamwe ryitwa Fondation Pax Burundi riyobowe n’umukuru w’Ishyaka riri ku butegetsi mu Burundi, Reverien Ndikuriyo.
Umuvugizi wa Fondation Pax Burundi, Fabrice Niragira, mu kiganiro n'umunyamakuru w'Ijwi ry'Amerika, Venuste Nshimiyimana, yamubajije impamvu bakorera mu mazu ya Maison Shalom.

Mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, iyi ndwi yatanguranye n’ubukene bw’ico gitoro, aho kibonetse naho hakaba hari imiduga umurengera w’abakirondera.
Ico gitoro kibuze mu gihe ata minsi myinshi yari iheze ubushikiranganji bw’amasoko ntanganguvu bwijeje ko ikibazo c’igitoro kigiye gutorerwa inyishu.
Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kw’igenekerezo rya 19 Rusama 2017, Come MANIRAKIZA, umushikiranganji w’amasoko ntanganguvu yagize ati :
"Nagira ndabahumurize ndababwira ko igitoro kigiye gufata inzira nziza yo kwinjira mu gihugu, hanyuma turabe ko dusubira mu bihe nk’uko twari tumeze mu Burundi."
- Come MANIRAKIZA, umushikiranganji ajejwe amasoko ntanganguvu
Ubwo bushikiranganji bwasubiriye kandi kwizeza abarondera igitoro ko bagiye kukironka. Mw’itangazo ryasohotse kuri uwu wa kabiri, Damien MPITABAKANA, umuyobozi ajejwe ivy’igitoro mu bushikiranganji bw’amasoko ntanganguvu, yasiguye ko imirongo miremire y’imiduga imaze iminsi ibiri yibonekeza mu bibanza bidandarizwamwo igitoro, iterwa n’ikibazo c’uko imiduga (Camions) itarapakururwa, iyo miduga ikaba ari iyazanye igitoro mu mpera z’indwi twaraye dusozereye.
Muri ubwo bushikiranganji bamenyesha ko umwanya uwariwo wose ico kibazo c’ubukene bw’igitoro casubiriye kwibonekeza gishobora kuba catorewe inyishu.

Umukinnyi wa APR FC, Nizeyimana Djuma yasabye iyi kipe ko yamurekura akajya gushakishiriza ahandi, ni nyuma y’uko akomeje kugorwa no kubona umwanya wo gukina muri iyi kipe y’ingabo z’igihugu.
Uyu mukinnyi uheruka kongera amasezerano mu ikipe ya APR FC muri Nyakanga 2021, arifuza gutandukana n’iyi kipe akajya aho akina.
Amakuru Atugeraho ni uko uyu mukinnyi yamaze kwandikira APR FC ayisaba kuba yamurekura muri uku kwezi kwa Mutarama 2022 ubwo isoko ry’igura rizaba rifunguye akajya aho abona umwanya wo gukina cyangwa se batashaka kumugurisha bakaba bamutiza kuko muri APR FC abona kubona umwanya wo gukina bigoranye.
Yageze muri APR FC muri 2019 ayisinyira imyaka 2, mu myaka ibiri yagiye agirirwa icyizere cyo gukina n’ubwo atahawe umwanya uhagije, kuva yakongera amasezerano y’imyaka 2 muri Nyakanga 2021 ntabwo yigeze abona umwanya wo gukina uhagije ari nayo mpamvu yifuza ko iyi kipe yamurekura.

Leister City yirahiye Aston Villa
Jack Grealish niwe yinjije igitego ca mbere ca Villa, hakurikira ica Carles Gil.
Ku ruhande rwa Leicester, Laet Volleyed niwe yugururiye abandi mu kwinjiza, ubwa kabiri hasubira Jamie Vardy yatumye banganya na Aston Villa ku munota wa 81.
Intsinzi ya Leicester yabonetse ku gitego ca gatatu cinjijwe na Nathan Dyer yateje umutwe aherejwe na Riyad Mahrez ku munota wa 88.
Nathan Dyer yaguzwe na Leister avuye muri Swansea ku munsi wa nyuma isoko rigomba ryugare.
Uko biri ubu Leicester City niyo iza ku mwanya wa kabiri ku rutonde rwerekana uko imirwi ihagaze muri kino kiringo ca Premier League.
Ibanzirizwa na Man city, Man United ikaza kumwanya wa gatatu mu gihe Arsenal ari iya kane.

Perezida Kabila muri Tanzania
Perezida wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Joseph Kabila yasabye Perezida wa Tanzania Joseph Pombe Magufuli kubafasha igihugu cye kikaba umunyamuryango w’agateganyo w’Umuryango w’Afurika y’Uburasirazuba.
Mu ruzinduko yagiriye muri Tanzania kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Perezida Kabila yavuze ko igihugu cye cyifuza kuba kimwe mu bigize EAC.
Iki gihugu cyaherukaga kubisaba mu mwaka wa 2010 hamwe na Sudani y’Epfo, nyamara Sudani y’Epfo yo yakomeje gukurikirana iremererwa mu gihe Congo itaremererwa.
Mu kiganiro Perezida Kabila na Mugufuli bagiranye n’itangazamakuru nyuma yo kuganira, bishimiye umubano hagati y’ibihugu byombi, ndetse Tanzania yizeza ubufasha Congo bwo kwinjira muri EAC.
Perezida Magufuli yagize ati “Twaganiriye uburyo DRC ishobora kwiyunga kuri EAC nk’indorerezi.Namubwiye ko bandika ibaruwa tukayibajyanira muri EAC mu biganiro.”
Aba bayobozi kandi baganiriye ku bufatanye mu by’ubukungu, aho Kabila yasezeranyije Tanzania ko bishoboka ko ibicuruzwa byose byinjira muri Congo byajya bica ku cyambu cya Dar es Salaam, na Magufuli yemera ko bagiye kugabanya inshuro ibicuruzwa bijya muri Congo byagenzurwaga, zikaba eshatu gusa.
Kwinjira kwa Congo muri EAC ni inyungu ikomeye kuri uwo muryango, kuko icyo gihugu gisanzwe gifitanye imishinga ikomeye n’ibyo bihugu irimo nk’iy’ingufu gihuriyeho na Uganda mu kiyaga cya Albert, n’iyo gihuriyeho n’u Rwanda mu kiyaga cya Kivu.Ni na kimw emu gifite umutungo kamere ukomeye.
Ibitekerezo

Mu gihe abafana ba FC Barcelone bategereje cyane umukino bazakiramo ikipe ya Real Madrid ku mukino wo kwishyura wa supercup yo muri Espanye,nyamara niwo mwanya bazaba babonye wo kwihimura ku musore Neymar Jr wavuye muri iyi kipe ahenze ariko mu buryo bubabaje.
Mu mukino wa gishuti Barca yakinnye na Chapacoence mu cyumweru cyashize haririmbwe indirimbo nshya umukino wose yavugaga ngo “Neymar muerete” bishatse kuvuga ngo Neymar pfa.Ndetse n’abandi batwika imyenda ya Neymar na nimero ye 11 yambaraga hanze ya stade nubwo abafana ba Barca bemeza neza ko ku mukino wa Real Madrid bizaba birenzeho nk’uko ikinyamakuru Don Balon cyibyemeza.
Kuri uwo mukino uzaba ku cyumweru,Neymar akaba azifatanya na Cristiano Ronaldo mu kuririmbwa nabi n’abafana nubwo yakoreye byinshi iyi kipe ariko byose byapfuye ayivamo nabi .

Mu rwandiko rwagiye ahabona, biragaragara ko mu runani CNARED bitoroshe ahubwo ko ari ibombora bombora. Umukuru w’urwo urunani ariwe jean Minani ari kumwe n’abamushigikiye arahanganye n’umurwi uri muri urwo runani nyene ushigikiye cane Alexis Sinduhije ko aja ku burongozi bw’urwo runani.
Jean Minani akaba yari agize imisi yagirizwa gutwara nabi urwo runani hamwe no gukoresha aka mwana wa mama muri urwo runani ruhurikiyemwo abatavuga ruwe na leta y’I Bujumbura bari hanze y’igihugu.
Urwo rwandiko ruravuga ivyo kudahuza mu ngingo zagiye zirafatwa hagati ya Jean Minani n’umugwi wa Alexis Sinduhije.
Bikaba binavugwa cane ko Minani Jean ashobora gusezererwa muri urwo runani mu kwezi kwa Mukakaro buca dutangura.

Umukino wa shampiyona y'icyiciro cya mbere muri Espagne wo ku munsi wa 12 ikipe ya Real Madrid yagombaga kuzakirwamo na Valencia ushobora gusubikwa nyuma y'ibiza byabaye muri iki gihugu.
Ku munsi w'ejo ku wa Kabiri taliki ya 30 Ukwakira 2024 nibwo mu gace ka Valencia mu gihugu cya Espagne habaye ibiza byatewe n'imvura yaguye amasaha arenga 8 igateza umwuzure. Ibikorwaremezo byarangiritse,abantu barakomereka naho abarenga 60 bakaba bamaze kuhasiha ubuzima kugeza ubu.
Umuyobozi wo muri aka gace ka Valencia , Carlos Mazon, yavuze ko mu gihe umwuzure uzaba urangiye hazafatwa igihe cy'Icyunamo cyo guha agaciro abitabye Imana.
Kuri ubu nk'uko ibinyamkuru bitandukanye bikomeje kubyandika, umukino wagombaga guhuza ikipe ya Valencia yo muri aka gace na Real Madrid muri shampiyona kuwa Gatandatu w'iki Cyumweru ushobora gusubikwa ukazaba ukinwa.
Ni mu gihe ikipe ya Real Madrid nayo ibinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo yihanganishije ababuriye ababo muri ibi biza.
Iyi kipe yari igiye gukina uyu mukino nyuma y'uko umukinnyi wayo , Vinicius Junior atariwe wahawe Ballon d'Or ndetse bikaba byaranatumye batitabira ibirori byo gutanga ibi bihembo. Ni nyuma y'uko kandi ku mukino uheruka yanyagiwe na FC Barcelona ibitego 4-0.
Umwuzure wibasiwe agace ka Valencia kagiye gutuma umukino wa Real Madrid usubikwa
TANGA IGITECYEREZO

Icivugo cari: "Urwaruka shingiro ry'iterambere ry'uno musi n'ejo, kugihugu no mukibano."
Itariki 27 Rusama 2024, ku cicaro gikuru ca Rajedes Burundi niho haramutse habera Haziko Imuhira igira 13. Umwe mubagize urwaruka rwa Haziko Imuhira niwe yaremesheje ikiyago c'umusi, mu ntangamarara ati: Ni gute dushobora kugwanya ivyiyumviro vyubushurashuzi mu gihe tukiri abayabaga?
Ica mbere dukwiye kudaha ikibanza ivyiyumviro vyubushurashuzi. Ica kabiri dukwiye kwirinda abagenzi babi. Ica gatatu dukwiye kumenya no gutegura imitego Satani aba yaduteze na cane cane iyo turikumwe nabahungu tukubahuka kuvuga OYA.
Ku civugo ca Haziko cuwo musi, urwaruka nimiyabaga itarenza imyaka 35, nirwo shingiro, nirwo terambere, nirwo rukibasha Kandi rushoboye gukora. Nico gituma rutegerezwa kuba umushinge mu bikorwa vy'iterambere mu gihugu narirya arirwo rugifise umwanya munini. Urwaruka rurakenerwa mu gucungera umutekano mu kibano, rurakenerwa mu nkino no mu bindi bisata vy'iterambere ry'igihugu. Kubwivyo rwategezwa kuba akarorero mu kibano narirya arigo Burundi bw'ejo.

Mu gihugu kibanyi c’Urwanda amakuru amaze igihe atembera nuko boba hari umumenyeshamakuru w’umunyarwanda yoba apungiwe mu Burundi naho hataramenyekana impamvu afungiweyo hamwe n’ahapfungiwe.
Ibinyamakuru nyarwanda bikaba bidasiba kuvugira ku nsamirizi zabo aho ziri hose ngo uwo munyamakuru afungurwe atagisabwe.
Mwomenya ko ivyo bikurikiye amakuru ikinyamakuru canyu cari caronse avuga ko hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe bigayitse igihugu c’urwanda kirimwo bigamije kudurumbanya igihugu, bikanavurwa ko hari na bamwe mu bakozi b’ipererezi ry’abanyarwanda boba baranabonetse I Burundi.

Imikino ya mbere y’amajonjora yo gushaka itike y’iki gikombe iteganyijwe tariki hagati ya tariki 16 na 18 Ugushyingo 2018, mu gihe Amavubi y’u Rwanda azaba yakiriye RDC, Intamba z’u Burundi zo zizaba zasuye Tanzania.
Mu bakinnyi 31 Umutoza Ghislain Bipfubusa w’u Burundi yahamagaye harimo babiri bakina mu Rwanda; kapiteni w’Amagaju FC Ndikumana Tresor na Bimenyimana Bonfils Caleb wa Rayon sports ufite ubwenegihugu bw’u Rwanda ariko wahisemo gukinira u Burundi, igihugu yakuriyemo.
Uyu rutahizamu watsindiye Rayon sports ibitego icumi mu mwaka w’imikino ushize, birimo bibiri byafashije iyi kipe kugera muri ¼ cya CAF Confederation Cup, yongeye gutangira neza uyu mwaka atsinda igitego rukumbi cyahaye ikipe ye intsinzi mu mukino ufungura shampiyona y’u Rwanda batsinze mo Etincelles FC mu mpera z’iki cyumweru.
Caleb ni inshuro ya mbere ahamagawe kuva yava muri Vital’O FC y’i Burundi agasinyira Rayon Sports mu mpeshyi ya 2017 nubwo mbere yaho yakoreshwaga mu mikino y’ikipe y’igihugu y’abakina imbere mu gihugu yashakaga itike ya CHAN ya 2018 yabereye muri Maroc.
Amakipe y’ibihugu umunani azitwara neza kurusha andi muri aya majonjora azatsindira itike yo kujya mu gikombe cya Afurika cy’abatarengeje imyaka 23 kizabera mu Misiri kuva tariki 8-12 Ugushyingo 2019, naho ane ya mbere muri iri rushanwa azatsindire itike yo guhagararira uyu mugabane mu mikino Olempike izabera i Tokyo mu Buyapani mu 2020.

Tariki ya 27 Gicurasi ni itariki itazibagiran mu mateka y’imibanire y’u Rwanda ndetse n’Ubufaransa, aho Perezida Emmanuel Macron yagiriye uruzinduko rw’iminsi ibiri mu Rwanda agamije kongera kunoza umubano w’ibihugu byombi warimo agatotsi kuva mu myaka 27 ishize.
Agatotsi mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi katerwaga ahanini n’uko Ubufaransa bwari bwarinangiye kwemera uruhare bwagize muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, mu gihe nyamara hari ibimenyetso simusiga ko Ubufaransa burangajwe imbere Françoi
... 
orewe Abatutsi,” cyane ko, “abicanyi bari bagambiriye kurimbura Abatutsi.”
Uruzinduko rwa Perezida Macron ntirwavugwagaho rumwe kuko rwagiye rwamaganwa n’abahezanguni bakomeje guhisha ukuri ku byabaye hiyongereyeho n’interahamwe zihishe mu Bufaransa zasize zihekuye u Rwanda ari nazo zasakuje cyane zigaragaza ko zitishimiye urugendo rwa Macron i kigali dore ko zari zifite ubwoba zizi ko agahuru kazo kagiye gukongoka.
Mu magambo Perezida Macron yavugiye i kigali yanahishuye ko Ubufaransa bugiye gu
...
i Wensisilas Munyeshyaka, ndetse n’izindi nterahamwe nyinshi zituye mu gace kitwa Rouen zafashwaga na Kabuga Felicien wamaze gufatwa, zirimo uwitwa Rwalinda Pierre Celestin, abahungu ba Habyarimana n’abandi benshi kimwe n’ibigarasha byirirwa bikwiza ingenga bitekerezo ya Jenoside birimo ingirwapadiri Nahimana Thomas n’abandi benshi.

Amagambo Mugabe yatangaje kuwa Gatandatu tariki ya 3 Nzeli, byatumye abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwe bamushinja kotsa igitutu inzego z’ubutabera.

a y’Umuryango w’ubukungu w’ibihugu bya Afurika y’Amajyepfo [SADC] yaberaga muri Swaziland kuwa Kabiri w’icyumweru gishize, ibyangombwa by’inzira bye bikaba byarerekanaga ko yafashe indege yerekeza i Dubai, aho byavugwaga ko agiye kwivuza.

Kuva kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 22 Ukwakira, ingabo z’igihugu cy’Uburundi Force de défense nationale du Burudni (FDN) zihanganye n’umutwe w’abarwanyi wiyise "Front du Peuple Murundi-Abatabazi"(FPM-Abatabazi) mu Ntara ya Cibitoke mu burengerazuba bw’igihugu cy’Uburundi.
Kuko byatangajwe na Fidèle Nzambiyakira, umuvugizi w’uyu mutwe wa FPM-Abatabazi, iyi ngo ikaba ariyo saha y’impinduramatwara mu gihugu cy’Uburundi aho yagize ati : Isaha y’impinduramatwara mu Burundi yageze.
Ku bijyanye n’iki gitero kinjiriye ku musozi wa Mahande muri Komini Murwi, colonel Gaspard Baratuza, umuvugizi w’igisirikare cy’Uburundi FDN we yirinze kuvuga ko ari umutwe w’abarwanyi bahanganye aho yatangaje ko bahanganye n’agatsiko k’amabandi mu ihuriro ry’imisozi yo muri Komini Murwi, Bukinyana na Mabayi, mu Ntara ya Cibitoke.
Colonel Gaspard Baratuza, akomeza avuga ko abasirikare be babujije ayo mabandi gukomeza kujya imbere aho yashakaga kwinjira mu ishyamba rya kimeza rya Kibira ryagiye rikunda gukoreshwa n’imitwe irwanya ubutegetsi muri iki gihugu.
Amakuru aturuka I Bujumbura, akaba avuga ko aba barwanyi binjiye muri Cibitoke baturutse mu gihugu cya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo.
Ernest NDAYISABA
Umuryango.com

Umukinnyi wa APR FC ukina mu kibuga hagati Mugisha Bonheur uzwi nka Casemiro akomeje kwishimirwa n’abanyatunisia bavugako yakina mu ikipe ikomeye.
Mugisha Bonheur ukina mu kibuga hagati nyuma yo kuzonga cyane ikipe ya US Monastir mu mukino ubanza wabereye i Huye, yongeye kwigaragaza cyane mu mukino wo kwishyura muri Tunisia bamwe mu bafana muri iki gihugu bavuga ko ari umukinnyi mwiza kandi ukomeye.
Nkuko bitangazwa na Niyibizi Aime ukora kuri Fine FM wajyanye n’iyi kipe, yatangaje ko Bonheur akomeje kuvugisha benshi muri Tunisia nyuma yo kwitwara neza kandi ko hari amakuru avugako yaba yatangiye kuganira nandi makipe akomeye ari ku rwego rurenze APR FC.
APR FC ibi byose biri kuza nyuma yo gutsindwa ibitego 3-0 benshi bemezaga ko ari 4-0 bitewe nuko hari igitego abasifuzi banze bavugako habayemo kurarira. Iyi kipe yavuyemo kugiteranyo k’ibitego 3-1 harimo igitego 1 gusa APR FC yatsinze mu mukino ubanza.

Ikipe ya Senegal yashyize hanze urutonde rw’abakinnyi 31 bazavamo abazaza mu Rwanda gukina umukino w’umunsi wa nyuma wa gatandatu wo gushaka itike yo gukina igikombe cya Afurika 2023.
Ni urutonde rw’abakinnyi batagaragaraho Sadio Mane wa Bayern Munich yo Mu Budage nk’umwe mu bakinnyi b’iyi kipe isanzwe igenderaho.
Imwe mu mpamvu isa naho aba bakinnyi batahamagawe ni uko ikipe y’igihugu ya Senegal yamaze kubona itike yo kuzakina imikino ya nyuma y’iki gikombe kizakinirwa muri Côte d’Ivoire.
Mu bandi bakinnyi batahamagwe hari Pape Gueye Habib Diallo, Kalidou Koulibaly, Krepin Diatta, Nicholas Jackson, Ismaila Sarr, Cheikhou Kouyate na Nampalys Mendy.
Si abo gusa kuko n’umutoza mukuru wayo Aliou Cisse ntabwo ariwe uzatoza uyu mukino kuko uzatozwa na Pape Thiaw w’ikipe y’abakina imbere mu gihugu, uyu mutoza kandi azaba afatanyije na Malick Diaf.
Umukino uzahuza u Rwanda na Senegel uzakinirwa i Huye, tariki ya 9 Nzeri 2023, muri iri tsinda kandi ikipe ya Mozambique izaba yakiriye Benin tariki ya 8 Nzeri 2023.
Senegal ni iyambere mu itsinda L, aho ifite amanota 13, irakurikirwa na Mozambique ifite amanota 7, Benin ikagira amanota 5 naho u Rwanda ruri ku mwanya wa nyuma n’amanota abiri aho hamaze gukinwa imikino 5 kuri buri kipe.
Urutonde rw’abakinnyi bahamagawe:

Umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko abarundi ari intashima,bashaka kuronkera rimwe ibintu vyose.Ibi yabishikirije ku musi w’ejo mw’ijambo yashikirije abarundi kw’iradiyo nkuru y’igihugu.
Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza ijambo ku barundi bose ku myaka 4 amaze arongoye igihugu kw’iradiyo nkuru y’igihugu,Umukuru w’ igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko abarundi ari intashima, bashaka kuronkera ibintu vyose rimwe.Agira ati:«Umurundi wese ashaka kuronka ibintu vyose ku mwanya umwe.niyo mpamvu mvuga ko abarundi ari intashima.»
Varisto Ndayishimiye yarashimye muri rusangi aho igihugu kigeze mw’iterambere muri iyi myaka 4 amaze ayoboye igihugu.kuvyerekeye ikibazo c’igitoro kimaze imisi cibonekeza mu gihugu,Varisto Ndayishimiye avuga ko igitoro Atari icimburwa mu gihugu.
Varisto Ndayishimiye yagize ati:«Uyu musi nshimishwa nuko abarundi bavuga bati turabuze iki mugabo ntibavuga ngo turabuze amahera yo kukigura»
Umukuru w’igihugu avuga kandi ko abarundi bariko barubaka amazu meza cane,bambara impuzu nziza bakaberwa kandi barya bagasigaza.

George Papandreou yasezeye ku bagereki
Kugeza ubungubu izina ry'ugomba kuyobora leta nshya y'Ubugereki ntiryari ryamenyekana.
Hagati aho ministri w'intebe, George Papandreou, yavuze ijambo ryo gusezera ku baturage ariko ntiyavuga izina ry'ugomba kumusimbura.
Yavuze ko hagiye kujyaho leta y'ubumwe bw'igihugu igomba gushyira mu bikorwa ibisabwa Ubugereki kugirango bubone inkunga bwemerwe n'ibihugu byo mu Burayi mu kwezi gushize.
Iyo leta kandi ngo igomba gukora ibishoboka byose kugirango Ubugereki bugume mu muryango w'ubumwe bw'Uburayi.
Ijambo rya ministri w'intebe, George Papandreou, ije nyuma y'iminsi itatu y'ibiganiro bitagize icyo bigeraho hagati ya leta n'amashyaka atavuga rumwe nayo bigamije kumvikana ku bagomba kwinjira muri leta nshya.

Ubuyobozi bw’Umugi wa Kigali buratangaza ko bugiye gukorana n’inzego z’umutekano mu gusubiza mu rugo abari kugaragara ku mihanda yo mu mujyi basabiriza bakagenerwa ubufasha kugirango bitume bubahiriza amabwiriza ya gahunda ya guma mu rugo.
Hari bamwe mu bagaragara ku mihanda itandukanye yo mu mujyi wa kiagali, aba bari kuhagragara mu gihe hashyizweho amabwiriza yo kuguma mu rugo gusa iyo ubabajije impavu batari kuguma mu rugo bagusubizako bakeneye ubufasha burimo ibifungurwa kugirango babashe kuguma murugo.
Kuri iyi ngingo, Ubuyobozi bw’Umugi wa Kigali Madamu Umutoni Gatsinzi Nadine, Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali Wungirije ushinzwe Ubukungu n’Imibereho myiza y’Abaturage akavugako bagiye gukorana n’inzego z’umutekano, aba bari kugaragara basabiriza bagasubizwa mu ngo bityo bakabashakira ubufasha .
Nubwo aba basabiriza batari kuguma mu rugo nkuko amabwiriza ya minisiteri y’ubuzima bigena ko gahunda ya guma mu rugo igomba kubahirizwa na buriwese nabo iyo ubavugisihije bumvikana bavugako batabikora nkana ahubwo ari ku bw’ubushobozi buke .
Minisiteri y’ubuzima ishishikariza buri Munyarwanda kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo Covid-19.

Trump: Abifata nka'abite ibitsina bibiri ntibashobora kujya mu gisirikare cya Amerika
Perezida Donald Trump yatangaje ko igisirikare cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kitazemera abantu bifata nk'abafite ibitsina bibiri, mu cyongereza bita transgender.
Bwana Trump yavuze ko batazakirwa mu rwego rw'ingabo urwo ari rwo rwose.
Icyemezo cye kivuguruje icy'uwamubanjirije, perezida Barack Obama.
Bwana Trump yakoresheje urubuga nkoranyamabaga rwa Twitter avuga ko yafashe icyemezo amaze kuganira n'aba jenerali ndetse n'abahanga mu ngabo.
Yongeyeho ko aba transgender babera umutwaro igisirikare kandi batakazwaho amafaranga menshi mu buvuzi.
Minisiteri y'ingabo, Pentagon, yavuze ko iri butangaze amabwiriza mashya kuri iki kibazo vuba.
Umunyamatego w'impirimbanyi irengera uburenganzira bw'aba transfender yavuze ko ibyatangajwe na Trump biteye inkeke kandi birimo ubujiji.

Abanyazimbabwe bararindiye ibiva mu matora ashobora guhindura ibintu ku vyerekeye ubutunzi bw’igihugu bwasanzaye.
Abitegereza ibintu ku murwa mukuru wa Zimbabwe, Harare, bavuga ko ata bibazo biboneka vyibonekeje igihe ibibanza vy’amatora vyugara mu masaha akuze yo ku muhingamo wo ku musi wa mbere.
Elmar Brock, ayoboye indorerezi z’umuryango w’ibihugu vy’i Bulaya, yatangaje ko amatora yabaye ata kibazo na gitoyi mu bice bimwe bimwe vy’igihugu. Yamara avuga ko mu bindi bice amatora yaranzwe n’akaj
... 
anza vy’amatora vyariko birugara. Ryamenyesheje kw’igitigiri c’abitavye amatora cari hagati y’ibice 85 n’ibice 92 kw’ijana. Abakozi bari mu bibanza vy’amatora n’indorerezi ziserukira imigambwe bamenyesheje ko ata bibazo bigaragara vyibonekeje umusi wose amatora yamaze.
Amatora y’ejo ku musi wa mbere muri Zimbabwe yahuje abakandida babiri bakomeye bahiganwa, Prezida Emmerson Mnangagwa, n’umunyepolitike atavuga rumwe na Reta, Nelson Chamisa. Prezida, Emmerson Mnangagwa, ayoboye umugambwe uri ku bu
...
, Movement for Democratic Change, mu mpfunyapfunyo, MDC, yakiwe n’abantu bari mu kamwemwe, igihe yashika mu kibanza yatoreyemwo ku murwa mukuru, Harare.
Muri ico gihe, umutegetsi wo mu mugambwe utavuga rumwe na Reta, MDC, Tendai Biti yatangaje uno musi ku wa kabiri, ko umuyobozi w’uwo mugambwe, Nelson Chamisa, yatsinze amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu.
Tendai Biti avuga ko ivyavuye mu matora vyerekana ata nkeka ko batsinze amatora, ko prezida agiye kuyobora Zimbabwe ari Nelson Chamisa.

Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda yatangaje ko ku wa Gatanu tariki 18 Kamena 2021, mu Rwanda abantu 451 babasanzemo Covid-19, umuntu umwe ni we wakize, undi muntu umwe yitabye Imana, naho abarembye ni 16 nk’uko imibare yatangajwe ibigaragaza.
Uwitabye Imana ni umugore w’imyaka 74 i Kigali, akaba yahise atuma umubare w’abamaze kwicwa n’iki cyorezo mu Rwanda uba abantu 378.
Abantu 246,476 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa COVID-19 (AstraZeneca) barimo 187 bayihawe kuri uyu wa Gatanu.
Imibare y’abandura ikomeje kugaragara ko irimo kwiyongera, dore ko mbere yaho na bwo hari habonetse abarwayi bashya 422.
Inzego zishinzwe ubuzima zisaba Abaturarwanda baba abakingiwe n’abatarakingirwa gukomeza kwitwararika birinda kwandura cyangwa kwanduza abandi icyorezo cya COVID-19, dore ko gikomeje kugaragaza ubukana mu Rwanda n’ahandi ku isi.

Umutwe wa M23 wanyomoje amakuru yatangajwe na Radio Okapi y’Ubutumwa bw’Umuryango w’Abibumbye muri DR Congo, yemezaga ko abarwanyi ba M23 ari bo bateye ibisasu mu gace ka Kibirizi bigahiitana abasivile b’inzirakarengane ndetse bikanangiza byinshi.
Abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa X, Umuhuzabikorwa wa M23, bwana Benjamin Mbonimpa, yamaganye ibyatangajwe na Radio Okapi, ashimangira ko ibi ari ibinyoma bigamije kuyobya rubanda no gukomeza gusiga isura mbi abarwanyi ba M23.
Radio Okapi yatangaje ko ku w
... 
nzego zishinzwe umutekano muri ako gace.
Ashingiye ku byatangajwe na Radio Okapi, Benjamin Mbonimpa yagize ati: “Ni gute M23 ubwayo yakwirasira muri Kibirizi kandi ari yo ihagenzura kuva mbere? Ibyo ni propaganda z’ubutegetsi bwa Kinshasa. Erega mwavuniye ibiti mu matwi no kumva ntimwumva”.
Yakomeje agira ati: “Ingabo za Kinshasa n’abambari bazo bazifasha barimo abacanshuro b’abarundi n’abazungu, SADC, Wazalendo n’abandi ziri gukora ibyaha by’intambara muri Rwindi na Kibirizi kugira ngo birukane
...
s ivuga ko ibyo bitero bya FARDC, Wazalendo, Ingabo z’u Burundi, abacanshuro, FDLR na SADC byatumye kandi abaturage bata ingo zabo bamwe bahungira mu bihuru harimo n’abahungiye i Minova mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyepfo.
Imyaka igiye kuba itatu hari uguhangana gukomeye hagati ya M23 n’ihuriro ry’Ingabo zirwana ku ruhande rwa Kinshasa. M23 ikomeje kugaragaza imbaraga ku rugamba ari nako yirukana abo bahanganye, ikaba imaze kwigarurira ibice byinshi byo muri Teritware za Masisi, Rutshuru na Nyiragongo.

Ubuyobozi bwa Police FC bwemeje Seninga Innocent nk’umutoza mu gihe cy’umwaka n’intego yo gusubiza icyubahiro iyi kipe mu makipe y’imbere mu gihe ari iya gatanu ku rutonde rwa shampiyona.
Seninga Innocent yari umutoza wa Etincelles mu gice cya kabiri cya shampiyona aho yayifashije kutamanuka mu cyiciro cya kabiri nyuma y’uko yari amaze kwirukanwa na Kiyovu Sports.
CIP Mayira Jean de Dieu, umunyamabanga akaba n’umuvugizi wa Police FC yemeje ko mu masaha ya saa sita aribwo Seninga Innocent yasinye aya masezerano y’umwaka umwe.
Mu bandi batoza bifuzwaga na Police FC hari Umugande Sam Timbe wabaye umutoza wa ATRACO FC itwara igikombe cya shampiyona na CECAFA Kagame Cup mu 2009.
Seninga Innocent asimbuye muri Police FC Cassa Mbungo Andre wirukanywe nyuma y’imyaka abiri ayihaye igikombe cy’amahoro, arasabwa gufasha iyi kipe yasezerewe muri 1/8 cy’irangiza m gikombe cy’amahoro yari yatwaye mu 2015.
Muri shampiyona, Police FC yatanze umusaruro muke kimwe no gusezererwa muri CAF Confederation Cup na Vita Club Mokanda yo muri Congo Brazzaville.
Akazi gakomeye ka Seninga Innocent ni ukugumana bamwe mu bakinnyi bari kurangiza amasezerano nka Nshimiyimana Imran, Habyarimana Innocent na Mvuyekure Emery bivugwa ko bifuzwa na APR FC no gushaka abandi bakinnyi.
Seninga Innocent yatoje mbere Isonga FC, Kiyovu Sports na Etincelles yatsinzemo imikino irindwi muri 15 yakinnye muri shampiyona.

Perezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, yishuye n’ishavu ryinshi ku gikorwa c’ugusaka ibiro vy’umushikirizamanza wiwe, Michael Cohen, cakozwe n’ibiro bijejwe gutohoza ivyaha, FBI. Yatangaje ko ico gikorwa c’ibiro FBI ari akamaramaza.
Abakozi ba FBI bashize mu bikorwa umutahe w’ugusaka ibiro vya Michael Cohen n’ihoteli yabamwo. Ivyo ni mu ntumbero yo gufata inzandiko zijanye n’ivy’amafranga hamwe n’izindi nzandiko, harimwo izijanye n’amadolari ibihumbi 130 Cohen yahaye Stormy Daniels akina amareresi arimwo imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Abantu bakwirikirana iyo dosiye babwiye ikinyamakuru The Washington Post na New York Times, ko Cohen ariko akwirikiranwa ku vy'uko ashobora kuba yabeshe ibanki kugira aronke ingurane.
Igikorwa c’ugusaka ibiro vya Micahel Cohen kivurwa ko cabaye bisabwe n’umushikirizamanza adasanzwe, Robert Mueller. Uwo amaze umwaka atohoza ukwivanga mu matora yo mu mwaka w’i 2016 muri Amerika ku Burusiya, n’uko abari bajejwe igikorwa c’ukwiyamamaza ca Donald Trump boba barakoranye n’Uburusiya.
Prezida Trump avuga ko igikorwa c’ugusaka ibiro vy’umushikirizamanza wiwe ari igikorwa gityoza igihugu cose.

Itangazamakuru naryo rinenga APR FC ko ritajya ritanga amakuru nkuko andi makipe yose atanga amakuru bigatuma abanyamakuru bitangariza amakuru bashatse.

Juvenal Mvukiyehe uyobora Kiyovu Sports yabwiye Taarifa ko abakozi be bashinzwe itumanaho bihuse batangaza ko ikipe ye yakiriye Kevin Ishimwe kandi batabyemeranyijeho. Avuga ko bari bakiri mu biganiro bitararangira.
Urubuga rwa Twitter rwa Kiyovu Sports rwanditse ko bishimiye kumwakira mu muryango mugari wa Kiyovu.
Bwana Mvukiyehe ati: “ Sinzi impamvu bahubutse bagatangaza ibintu tutabyemeranyijeho. Turi mu biganiro na Kevin Ishimwe ariko ntibirarangira.”
N’ubwo Mvukiyehe yirinze kwemeza ko Ishimwe ari uwabo, amakuru Taarifa ifite avuga ko Ishimwe Kevin ari umukinnyi wa Kiyovu ariko uzayikinira nk’ intizanyo. Mu kanya gashize ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hari amakuru avuga ko ashobora gukomereza no muri Rayon Sports nabwo ari intizanyo.
Yari asanzwe akinira APR FC.
Twamenye kandi ko avuye muri APR FC kubera imyitwarire mibi, akaba yirukanywe igitaraganya ubwo bari mu mwiherero w’ikipe aho isanzwe iwukorera i Shyorongi.
Yari asanzwe afite amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri yasinye ubwo yavaga muri AS Kigali.
Yaramaze gukinira APR FC umwaka umwe.
Asanzwe akina aca ku mpande.
Kevin Ishimwe amaze gukinira amakipe mu Rwanda arimo APR FC, Rayon Sport SPORT, AS Kigali na Pepinière FC.

Umuhuza mu kibazo cy’umutekano mucye uri mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo, Uhuru Kenyatta, wahoze ari Perezida wa Kenya, yatangaje ko ahangayikishijwe n’umutekano mucye mu Ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru, by’umwihariko abaturage bari kujujubywa.
Amagambo yatangarije kuri twitter, avuga ko “Iyi Ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru hari kubera imirwano ikaze hagati y’inyeshyamba, ingabo za Leta, FARDC ndetse n’umutwe wa M23.”
Kuri Uhuru Kenyatta asanga amasezerano ya Nairobi na Luanda aramutse yubahirijwe, yafasha mu kugarur
... 
u nama yabaye mu Gushyingo umwaka ushize yahuje abayobozi b’ibihugu by’Akarere, barimo Ndayishimiye Evariste, Felix Tshisekedi, na Uhuru Kenyatta ku butumire bwa Perezida wa Angola João Lourenço, yafatiwemo ibyemezo bitandukanye bisaba imitwe yitwaje intwaro kuzirambika hasi nubwo nta byakozwe.
Undi mwanzuro uvuga ko hagomba kubahirizwa ibyemezo byo mu nama z’Abakuru b’ibihugu bya EAC, zabaye ku wa 21 Mata, na 20 Kamena, 2022 mu nzira y’ibiganiro bya Nairobi, ndetse n’ibyemezo byafatiwe i Luanda
...
agenzurwa n’ingabo z’Akarere, n’urwego ngenzuzi kandi uyu ukaba ari umwe mu yafashwe mu nama y’abakuriye ingabo yabereye i Bujumbura.
Bisa nkaho Congo yavuniye ibiti mu matwi mu gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro y’inama ya Luanda .
Mu minsi ishize idoha muri Quatar hari hateganyijwe inama ihuza abakuru b’ibihugu bya Congo n’uRwanda, igamije gushakira hamwe igisubizo cy’umutekano mucye uri muri Congo, ku munota wa nyuma Perezida Tshisekedi yanga kwitabira ibyo biganiro.

Abakina umupira w’amaguru bafite ubumuga bw’ukuguru kumwe bateguriwe irushanwa “Amputee Football tournament” ribanziriza shampiyona y’igihugu.
Iri rushanwa ryitabirwa n’abakinnyi bafite ubumuga bw’ukuguru kumwe, ariko bakina bafite imbago.
Rugwiro Audace ukuriye “Rwanda Amputee Football Association” yatangarije ikinyamakuru Izuba Rirashe ko iryo rushanwa ribanziriza shampiyona rizatangira tariki ya 10 Mutarama kugeza 27 Gashyantare 2016.
Amakipe azitabira iyi mikino y’abafite ubumuga ari mu matsinda (Poul).
Muri Poule A harimo amakipe yo mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo nka Gisagara ,UNR na Gatagara.
Muri Poule B harimo: Kigali AFC, Esperance na Rubavu AFC
Rugwo mu kiganiro n’ikinyamakuru Izuba Rirashe yagize ati “ubundi iri rushanwa twariteguye mu rwego rwa tournoi ya pre season kugira ngo abantu babone ko umukino uriho tubone no gutegura n’izindi gahunda ziri imbere”.
Mu Rwanda uyu mupira watangiye ku mugaragaro muri 2015 mu kigo cya Espérance kiri ku Kimisagara mu Mujyi wa Kigali.

Umukozi w’Umukontabure ndetse n’uwo bita Adimini ( ushinzwe imari n’ubutegetsi) bakora mu murenge wa Gacurabwenge, kuri uyu wa Kane Tariki 5 Nzeli 2019 mu masaha ya mbere ya saa sita bafashwe n’urwego rw’ubugenzacyaha-RIB.
Umuturage wari mu Kagari ka Nkingo aho umwe muri aba bakozi yakuwe (Admin), yabwiye intyoza.com ko yabonye abakozi ba RIB bari kumwe n’abapolisi baza bagafata uyu mukozi bakamutwara.
Nyirandayisabye Christine, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Gacurabwenge utashatse kugira byinshi avuga kuri aba bakozi, yemereye umunyamakuru ko aya makuru yayumvise ariko ko agikurikirana ngo amenye neza imvano y’ibyo bafatiwe.
Gitifu Nyirandayisabye, nubwo avuga ko nta makuru mpamo y’ibyo aba bakozi ayobora bafatiwe, akeka ikibazo cy’imashini ikoreshwa na Kontabure iherutse kwibwa mu biro by’Umurenge.
Mu iyibwa ry’iyi mashine, amakuru agera ku intyoza.com ni ay’uko uwabanje gukekwa ndetse agafatwa na RIB akaza no kurekurwa ari umukozi ushinzwe gucunga umutekano (umuzamu w’amanywa).
Byinshi ku ifatwa ry’aba bakozi turacyabikurikirana.
Munyaneza Theogene / intyoza.com
Turabemera rwose mbakundira ko mutugezaho amakuru agezweho mu karere kacu ka kamonyi mukomereze aho natwe tubahoza ku mutima

Umuherwe w'Umunyamerika Bill Gates n'uwari umugore we Melinda Gates batangaje ko nyuma y'imyaka 27 bashakanye ubu batandukanye, bagira bati: 'Ntitucyemeza ko dushobora gukurana hamwe nk'abashakanye'.
Mu itangazo bombi bashyize kuri Twitter, bagize bati: 'Nyuma yo kubitekerezaho cyane no kugira ibyo dukora byinshi ku mubano wacu, twafashe icyemezo cyo gusoza urushako rwacu'.
Bahuye bwa mbere mu myaka ya 1980 ubwo Melinda yajyaga gukora muri kompanyi y'ikoranabuhanga Microsoft ya Bill.
Aba batunze za miliyari z'amadolari, babyaranye abana batatu ndetse bombi bahuriye mu kuyobora ikigo Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.Icyo kigo kimaze gukoresha za miliyari z'amadolari mu kurwanya indwara zandura no gushishikariza ibikorwa byo gukingiza abana.
Bill Gates ni we muntu wa kane ukize cyane ku isi, nkuko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Forbes, abarirwa umutungo wa miliyari 124 z'amadolari y'Amerika.
Source : https://impanuro.rw/2021/05/04/bill-gates-na-melinda-gates-batandukanye/

Frolent Ibenge, umutoza w’ikipe ya AS Vita Club akaba ari n’umutoza wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo yashimye abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda akaba yaraje kubakurikirana.
Ibenge wakurikiye umukino Rayon Sports yatsinzemo Rwamagana ibitego 4-1, avuga ko mu Rwanda hari abakinnyi benshi yakwifuza kuba bamukinira.
Ati ” mu Rwanda mufite abakinnyi beza barimo, Nshuti Dominique Savio, Iranzi Jean Claude, umuzamu Ndayishimiye Eric bariya ba myugariro bo hagati babiri n’abandi bakinnye CHAN”.
Abajije niba yaje mu Rwanda gukurikira umukinnyi Sugira Ernest cyangwa undi rutahizamu wa Rayon Sports, Ibenge yavuze ko ari ibivugwa, kuko iyo nta muntu urashyira umukono ku masezerano haba ntakiraba.
Irushanwa ry’ibihugu ry’abakinnyi bakina muri shampiyona yabo (CHAN) yabereye mu Rwanda ikegukanwa na RDC, ikirangira uyu mutoza yavuze ko Sugira ari umwe mu bakinnyi bitwaye neza yakwifuza kumukinira.
Ibenge avuga ko mu Rwanda hari abakinnyi benshi, ati ” mu Rwanda hari abakinnyi beza bakinnye 1/4 cya CHAN, ubwo rero bisaba ko bashakishwa, muri Mutarama twakinnye n’u Rwanda nabwo nabonye abakinnyi beza.
Sugira ni umukinnyi mwiza cyane, hari n’abandi bakinnyi bakina neza”.
Ibenge utoza RDC yasezereye Amavubi muri 1/4 cya CHAN, ariho yaboneye ko mu Rwanda hari abakinnyi yakwifuza gukinisha muri Vita Club atoza.
RDC yegukanye CHAN istinze Mali ibitego 3-0 ihabwa yahise ihabwa ibihumbi 750,000 by’amadolari n’igikombe.

Nigeria yahakanye ibirego vy'"umuceri wa plastique"
Umushikiranganji w'ubuvuzi Isaac Adewole yanditse kuri Twitter ko ikigo kijejwe gusuzuma ibifungugwa ata kintu na kimwe catoye cerekana iyo plastique ivugwa.
Uwurongoye ikigo gitoza amakori mu muji wa Lagos Haruna Mamudu yavuze ku musi wa gatatu ko uwo muceri utari wo wari ugenewe kugurishwa igihe c'imisi mikuru.
Nta wuzi neza iyo iyo mifuko 102 yafashwe yavuye ariko umuceri ukozwe muri plastique warafashwe mu Bushinwa mu mwaka uheze.
Adewole yavuze ko ico kigo "kizoshikiriza icegeranyo abanyagihugu ni carangiza itohoza", asaba abanya Nigeria kuguma batekanye.
Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Stephanie Hegarty ari i Abuja yavuze ko ico cegeranyo kizosohoka ku musi wa kabiri.
Mamudu yavuze ko uwo muceri wamata nk'uburembo utetse "Imana yonyene ngo niyo izi ivyoshitse"iyo abantu bawurya.
Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Lagos Martin Patience yimotereje uwo muceri yavuze ko usa n'uwukuri ariko ko ufise akamoto k'imiti.

Bamwe mu bakinnyi b’abanyarwanda bakunze kutita ku iterambere ry’imizamukire y’imikinire yabo.
Abenshi bahita mo kujya gushakisha amafaranga mu ikipe zirusha izo bari mo ubushobozi, abandi bakegerwa n’izo kipe.

Savio Nshuti yifuza gukina mu ikipe ifite abafana
Ku munsi wa kabiri wa Shampiyona y’u Rwanda, ikipe zombi za Savio zarahuye. Ni ukuvuga Rayon Sport yahoze akinira izwi ho kugira abafana benshi na AS Kigali yakinaga mo kuri uwo munsi ifite abafana babaze.
Nyuma y’uwo mukino uyu musore atangaza ko bigoye cyane gukina mu ikipe itagira abafana.
Aragira ati “kumenyera gukina mu ikipe ifite abafana nyuma ukaza kujya mu itabafite ni ibintu bigoranye cyane, kuko abafana hari icyo bong
...
enshi avuga ko Nshuti Savio yaba ashakwa n’ikipe zitandukanye, zirimo Rayon Sport; APR FC na Simba yo muri Tanzaniya.
Uburyo ikipe zo mu Rwanda zireshya abakinnyi bukwiye guhinduka bukajyana n’iterambere ry’impano zabo zo gukina umupira, ariko nabo ntibihereze muremure, ngo hato amatiku atangire bataramarana kabiri.
Hakwiye kurebwa uburyo umukinnyi yabaho neza, cyane ko abenshi batunzwe no gukina, ariko n’ikipe ntizigwe mu matsa, ngo zizabure abakinnyi bari bafitanye amasezerano.

HARUNA NIYONZIMA amaze gusimbuzwa mbere yuko umukino utangira-Menya impavu
Haruna Niyonzima usanzwe ari kapiteni w’Amavubi yavanywe mu bakinnyi 11 b’Amavubi agiye guhura na Seychelles bitewe n’uko uyu mugabo afite ibyangombwa bidahuza amakuru muri FIFA.
Nyuma y’uko AS Kigali yatse ibyangombwa muri CAF kugira ngo azabakinire imikino ya Total CAF Confederation Cup ntibikunde, Amavubi yabujijwe gukoresha Haruna Niyonzima kuko ngo afite ibyangombwa birenze kimwe bigaragaza imyaka itandukanye n’iyo FIFA izi.
Basaba ibyangombwa, AS Kigali bavuze ko Haruna Niyonzima yavutse tariki 20 Nyakanga 1988 mu gihe muri FIFA basanzwe bazi ko Haruna Niyonzima ukinira ikipe y’u Rwanda (Amavubi) yavutse tariki ya 5 Gashyantare 1990.
Dore abakinnyi 11 muri rusange:
1. Kimenyi Yves (GK.23),
2. Ombolenga Fitina 13,
3.Emery Bayisenge 15,
4. Rwatubyaye Abdul 22,
5. Imanishimwe Emmanuel 2,
6.Mukunzi Yannick 6,
7.Bizimana Djihad 4,
8.Muhire Kevin 11,
9. Tuyisenge Jaques (C,9),
10.Meddie Kagere 5 na
11.Hakizimana Muhadjili 10.
Umukino nyirizina uratangira saa munani (14h00’) ku masaha ya Kigali biraba ari saa kumi i Victoria muri Seychelles.
Written by Remmy Rukundo

U Rwanda rukomeje kuba ku mwanya wa nyuma mu itsinda rutaratsinda umukino n’umwe.

...

Igice cya kabiri cyatangiye Mali iri hejuru, Mussa Jenepo ukinira ikipe ya Southampton mu Bwongereza, ntabwo yahiriwe no kugaruka mu mukino kuko yaje kuba ava mu kibuga bitunguranye.

Robert Mugabe yahoze ari perezida wa Zimbabwe bitegekanijwe ko apfubwa mu mpera z’iyi ndwi, inyuma y’aho ikiziga ciwe kizoba cavanwe muri Singapore aho yapfiriye ku musi wa gatanu, vyashikirijwe n’umuvugizi wa perezida ejo kuw’Imana.
Umuvugizi wa perezida, George Charamba yashikirije ko ikiziga ca Mugabe citezwe gutahukanwa muri Zimbabwe kuri uyu wa gatatu, akazoca apfubwa ku musi w’Imana.
Ariko ikibanza azohambwamwo ntikiramenyekana, mu gihe umuryango wa Mugabe na reta ya perezida Emmerson Mnangagwa batarumvikana nimba yopfubwa mw’itongo ryiwe mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bw’umurwa mukuru Harare canke ku cibutso c’ababohoje igihugu kiri ku murwa mukuru.
Mnangagwa yategetse ku musi wa gatanu ko Mugabe agandarirwa, ariko ntiyatomoye igihe ico kigandaro comara.
Mugabe yapfuye afise imyaka 95, kandi yatwaye Zimbabwe imyaka 37.

Umutoza wa Arsenal,Unai Emery yatangaje ko iyi kipe ikeneye ba rutahizamu batyaye ariyo mpamvu mu mpeshyi yifuza abakinnyi babiri, Ryan Fraser na Moussa Dembele.
Arsenal iri kurwana no kurangiza mu makipe 4 ya mbere,irifuza kongera imbaraga mu busatirizi ariyo mpamvu Emery yatangiye kurambagiza ba rutahizamu yifuza kugura mu mpeshyi.
Unai Emery ntarahabwa amafranga yo kugura abakinnyi ariko biteganyijwe ko nabasha kugeza Arsenal mu makipe ane ya mbere muri premier League,azahabwa arenga miliyoni 100 z’amapawundi kugira ngo asane ahava mu ikipe ye.
Ryan Fraser yitwaye neza mu ikipe ya AFC Bournemouth muri uyu mwaka w’imikino,kuko amaze gutsinda ibitego 8 ndetse yatanze imipira 10 yavuyemo ibitego,mu gihe Moussa Dembele wa Lyon amaze kuyitsindira ibitego 18 muri uyu mwaka w’imikino.
Unai Emery yakunze Dembele akiri mu ikipe ya Celtic ndetse ngo asanzwe ari umufana ukomeye we,ndetse na Ryan Fraser.
Nubwo Dembele yifuzwa na Manchester United,Emery yamaze gusaba abashinzwe kumugurira abakinnyi ko batangira kumurambagiza
Dembele na Fraser barifuzwa na Emery

Ikipe y’igihugu y’umukino wa Cricket mu bagabo ntirimo kwitwara neza nyuma y’aho gutsindwa imikino yose imaze gukina mu irushanwa ry’amajonjora yo guhatanira itike yo kwerekeza mu gikombe cy’isi.
Irushanwa ririmo kubera mu Rwanda ryatangiye tariki ya 07 Nyakanga 2018 ryitabiriwe n’ibihugu bine byo muri aka karere ari byo u Rwanda, Uganda, Tanzania na Kenya imaze kwigarurira Cricket yo muri aka karere.
Mu muhango wo gutangiza iri rushanwa, Eddie Mugarura, Perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Cri
... 
ku rwego nk’uru. Turakeka ari ibintu byiza n’icyerekezo cyiza kuri Cricket yo mu Rwanda {…} Team Rwanda yiteguye kubona itike yo kujya mu cyiciro gikurikiyeho. Ntacyo tutakoze twizeye ko ikipe iri tayari.”
Eric Dusingizimana kapiteni w’ikipe y’igihugu na we yunze mu rya Perezida wa Cricket avuga ko biteguye kwitwara neza bakabona itike yo gukomeza mu kiciro gikurikiye ho.
Ati “Turashimira MINISPOC yadufashije kwitegura ndetse na Federation batwitayeho; nta kibazo cy’imyiteguro dufite, tumeze nez
...
gukina. Mu mukino wa mbere nyuma yaho ikipe ya Kenya yari imaze gutsinda Uganda amanota 241 kuri 240, ikipe ya Tanzania yahise yihererana u Rwanda irutsinda 197 kuri 121.
Mu mikino y’umunsi wa kabiri yabaye ku cyumweru tariki ya 08 Nyakanga 2018, Uganda yatsinze Tanzania 181 ku 117, na ho Kenya yisasira u Rwanda irutsinze amanita 270 ku 147.
Igikombe cy’isi cya Cricket kizatangira mu kwezi kwa gatanu umwaka utaha wa 2018, kikazabera mu gihugu cy’u Bwongereza na Wales.
