Komiseri mukuru wa Polisi ya Uganda Martin Okoth Ochola yaburiye abaturage ba Uganda ko uzahirahira agahungabanya umutekano ku munsi w’amatora ‘azicuza icyo Nyina yamubyariye.’
Amatora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu muri Uganda azaba tariki 14, Mutarama, 2021, akaba azaba ahanganyemo n’abandi ariko ukomeye muri bo ni Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu uzwi nka Bobi Wine.
Ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Museveni bushinja Bobi Wine gukorana n’ibihugu byo hanze, bukemeza ko bigamije kumukuraho bugashyiraho ubwo bwiyumvamo.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Polisi ya Uganda( Uganda Police Force) IGP Martin Okoth Ochola yahaye gasopo uwo ariwe wese wazahirahira agashaka guhungabanya amatora.
Yagize ati: “ Ndashaka kubwira igihugu cyose ko uzahirahira agashaka guhungabanya amatora azahura n’akaga k’uburyo azicuza icyo Nyina yamubyariye.”
Yavuze ko hari amakuru Polisi ifite avuga ko hari abanyapolitiki bateguye gahunda yo kuzahungabanya amatora, bakabikora binyuze mu kuvuga ko hari amajwi yibwe kugira ngo ibarura ryayo ritagenda neza.
Perezida Museveni nawe aherutse gusaba abaturage be kuzitabira amatora mu mutuzo, ariko aburira uwo ari wese uzashaka kuyahungabanya ko bizamukoraho.
Museveni yari aherutse gusimbuza bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru ba Polisi ya Uganda.
Yagize Major Gen Paul Lokech umuyobozi wungirije wa Polisi amusimbuje Maj Gen Sabiiti Muzeeyi.

Urubanza rwa Laurent Bucyibaruta wahoze ari Perefe wa Perefegitura ya Gikongoro ukurikiranyweho ibyaha bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi 1994, rubera mu rukiko rwa rubanda i Paris mu Bufaransa kugeza ubu hakomeje kwakirwa abatangabuhamya batandukanye, aho umwe muri 2012 wavuze ko adashobora kumutangaho ubuhamya, ariko muri 2022 aza kwisubiraho akaba ari umwe mu batangabuhamya bumviswe kuri uyu wa Gatatu.
Amakuru ikinyamakuru IMPAMBA.COM gikesha abanyamakuru bagiye kumva uru rubanza avuga ko kuri uy
... 
zi budashaka yari kugirirwa nabi cyane kuko yari muri gereza ariko kuri ubu ngo nta bwoba afite ibintu mu Rwanda byahindutse.
Humviswe na none umutangabuhamya wigaga mu ishuri rya Marie Merci riri mu Karere ka Nyamagabe ahahoze kera ari muri Perefegitura ya Gikongoro yayoborwaga na Bucyibaruta mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi 1994, wavuze ko mbere ya Jenoside ku ishuri yabonye haba igeragezwa rya Jenoside yagize ati “abanyeshuri b’Abahutu twiganaga bishe Abatutsi habanje imyigaragambyo nij
...
 bavuga ko bahambye Abatutsi bose”.
Urubanza rwa Bucyibaruta Laurent w’imyaka 78 kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 18 Gicurasi 2022 rwari rugeza ku munsi wa 8, rwatangiye tariki ya 9 Gicurasi 2022, aho akekwaho kugira uruhare mu rupfu rw’abiciwe mu duce dutandukanye twa Gikongoro nko kuri Kiliziya ya Mbuga, Kiliziya ya Cyanika n’iy’i Kaduha, ku ishuli ry’i Murambi, Ecole des Filles de Kibeho (ubu ni mu Karere ka Nyaruguru) no kuri Gereza ya Gikongoro, mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994.

Mu rukino rwa mbere rwahuje umurwi wa Manchester City wo mu Bwongereza n’umurwi Fc Bale wo mu Buswise, umurwi Manchester City watsinze ibitsindo 4 ku busa bwa FC Bale.
Mu rundi rukino umurwi wa Juventus de Turin wo mu gihugu c’Ubutariyano wanganije n’umurwi Tottenham wo mu Bwongereza ibitsindo bibiri ku bindi, naho nyene umurwi Juventus ariwo wari wasa n’uwuhava utahana intsinzi, kuko wakinira ku kibuga cawo.
Ku kibuga ca Juventus, urukino rwatanguye neza ku ruhande rw’umurwi Juventus de Turin, kuko mu minota 20 y’urukino wari umaze gutsinda ibitsindo 2-0 bitsinzwe n ;umusatirizi Gonzalo Higuain, akaba yarananiwe na Penalty igice ca mbere kigomba gihere.
Tottenham yivyukiranije ku munota wa 35, aho Harry Kane yatsinda igitsindo kivuye ku gusamara kw’abakinyi b’inyuma.Igice ca kabiri kigeze hagati ku munota wa 72, Christian Eriksen nawe aca atsinda igitsindo ca 2.
Ku ruhande rwa Manchester City , Ilkay Gündogan yatsinze igitsindo ca mbere ku munota wa 14, Bernardo Silva ku munota wa 18 atsinda ica kabiri, Sergio Kun Aguero atsinda ica gatatu ku munota wa 23, Ilkay Gündogan yiyongera ikindi gitsindo ku munota wa 53, gutyo urukino ruhera ku bitsindo 4 vyose ku busa.
Umurwi Manchester City usa n’uwamaze kuronka amahirwe yo gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, na rirya urukino rwabaye rwakiniwe ku kibuga ca FC Bale.
Inkino zo gusubiriza zikaba zitegekanijwe kw’igenekerezo rya 7 Ntwarante 2018

Abategetsi bo mugice co hagati ca Somaliya hamwe n’abavyiboneye bamenyesha ko abantu barenga 20 bapfuye mu mirwano yabaye hagati y’abasirikare ba reta hamwe n’umuhari w’intagondwa wa Al-Shabab.
Abarwanyi ba Al-Shabab bateye ikambi y’abasirikare ba Somaliya iri ahitwa El-Hareri mu bucagucagu bwo k’umusi wa gatatu.
Uwurongoye iyo kambi yamenyesheje ko aba Al –Shabab 18 bishwe, abasirikare batanu ba reta barapfa hamwe n’abasivile.
Abategetsi ba reta bamenyesha kandi ko aba Al-Shabab barenga 10 hamwe n’abasirikare 2 bakomeretse mur’iyo mirwano.

Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubugenzuzi bw’ibiribwa n’imiti (Rwanda FDA), cyahagaritse by;agateganyo gucuruza, gukwirakwiza no kunywa inzoga zitwa UMUNEZA na TUZANE (Banana Based Alcoholic Beverage).
Imwe muri izi nzoga yitwa UMUNEZA iri mu zikekwa kwica abantu 4 bo mu Murenge wa Kimihurura mu Karere ka Gasabo kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 27 Ukuboza 2021.
Abitabye Imana barimo Abagabo 3 n’umugore umwe. Mu gihe abandi 3 bari barembeye kwa muganga.
Nyuma y’urupfu rw’aba bantu inzego zitandukanye zirimo iz’ubuzima n’ubugenzacyaha zahise zivuga ko zatangiye gukurikirana iby’iki kibazo.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubugenzuzi bw’ibiribwa n’imiti (Rwanda FDA), cyatangaje ko hashingiwe k igenzura ryakozwe, nyma ya raporo z’abantu bikekwa ko bagizweho ingaruka nyuma yo kunywa zimwe muri izi nzoga.
Iki kigo kibaye gihagaritse ubucuruzi bwazo, kuzikwirakwiza no kuzinywa.
Rwanda FDA ivuga ko igikora ubusesenguzi bwimbitse ndetse n’ibipimo bya Laboratwari ngo hamenyekane icyateye ingaruko zirimo n’urupfu kri aba bantu.

ampiyona nkuko byari bisanzwe, ari ukubera kutitabwaho n’ubuyobozi bw’ikipe.

Iyo bavuze amabi afatiye ku gitsina, benshi twumva gufata ku nguvu n’ibindi bisa na vyo gusa. Ihibambewe! Si ivyo gusa. Hari n’ibindi vyinshi mbere dukora tutazi, bikozwe, aba ari guhohotera umukenyezi. Turabire hamwe muri make uko ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira iterambere […]
Ukivyumva wokwibaza ko ari ibitito. Ariko ni ivy’ukuri. Nibaza ko hari abantu bafata abigeme nk’ibidandazwa canke inka ushora ku macuniro; ahandi naho nkumirwa mbonye ingene nacumukuye mu kwiga, narangiza bakampa akazi ko kudandaza umubiri mu nzu y’uburaro. Ng’uku uko vyangendeye.

Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga wa Ukraine yatangaje kuri Twitter ko "Putin amaze gutangiza ibitero bigari kuri Ukraine".

Ambasaderi Sergiy Kyslytsya wa Ukraine muri ONU/UN yavuze ko uhagarariye Uburusiya muri ONU yemeje ko perezida we yatangaje "intambara ku gihugu cyanjye", nk’uko bivugwa n’ibiro ntaramakuru Reuters.

merika yahise avuga ko ibitero by’Uburusiya bidafite impamvu kandi "amasengesho y’isi yose ari ku bantu ba Ukraine."

"Uburusiya bwonyine nibwo nyirabayazana w’imfu no gusenya bizava kuri iki gitero, kandi Leta zunze ubumwe n’inshuti zayo bizasubiza mu buryo bushyize hamwe kandi bukomeye. Isi izabaza ibi Uburusiya."

we byatewe "n’intege nke" za Amerika ubwo zakuraga ingabo muri Afghanistan.

IHINDAGURIKA RY'IBIHE
Mu Burundi nko muyindi mice y'isi haribonekeza ihindagurika ry'ibihe, bigatuma inkurikizi zaryo zibandanya zibonekeza mu gihugu no hanze yaco.
Ihindagurika ry'ibihe ry'ibonekeza iyo umuntu yize uko ubushuhe bwagiye bwiyongera canke bugabanuka mu kiringo kanaka (nko mu myaka mirongo ibiri 20 nk'akarorero).
Ihindagurika ry'ibihe ryoba riva kuki?

... 
 n'ibindi n'ibindi.....
Kutubaka amabarabara ameze neza bigatuma umukungugu wonona ikirere canecane mu gihe c'ici.[2]
Inkurikizi z'ihindagurika ry'ibihe
- Ukuduga kw'ubushuhe ku rugero rwo hejuru;
- Imvura ikanka kurwa canke iyo iguye ikarwa ku rugero runini bigatuma hononekara imirima, inyubako zitandukanye nk'amabarabara n'amazu ndetse rimwe na rimwe n'ubuzima bw'abantu bukahasigara;
- Uruzuba rwinshi rutuma ibifungurwa bitera neza hagaca haduka inzara, abantu bagapfa, amashamba agahona be n'i
...
miques). Gukura ivyotsi vyamaze gushika mu kirere muco bita (désintoxication aérienne) be n'ugutera ibiti vyinshi bishoboka.
Ni muriyo ntumbero reta y'Uburundi mu mugambi wayo "Ewe Burundi urambaye" yihaye ihangiro ryo gutera ibiti kumisozi yose igize igihugu. Mu mwaka wa 2021, hari hamaze guterwa ibiti birenga imiriyoni 20.
Kugira ihindagurika ry'ibihe rihagarare, bisaba ko buri muntu ashiramwo inguvu canecane mukudata imyanda aho abonye hose, no kutarungika amazi acafuye mu nzuzi no mu biyaga.

Nyuma yo kwibaruka imfura Diamond na Tanasha havutse intonganya biravugwa ko bagiye gukoresha ikizamini cya DNA kugira ngo hamenye neza se w’umwana.
Nyuma yo kwibaruka undi mwana mu rugo kwa Diamond havutse intonganya
Inkuru dukesha Global Publishers ivuga ko ibintu byifashe nabi kwa Diamond na Tanasha nyuma yo kwibaruka umwana tariki ya 2 Ukwakira 2019.
Iki kinyamakuru kandi kivuga ko umwe mu muryango wa Diamond, avuga ko bashaka gukoresha DNA nyuma y’uko basanze uyu mwana adasa na Diamond ndetse ngo afite imisatsi isa nk’iyA barabu.
Yagize ati“Nyuma y’uko mama wa Diamond ashyize amafoto hanze ya bimwe mu bice by’umutwe by’uyu mwana, byakuruye ikintu gisa n’amayobera. Bamwe baravuga ngo afite imisati y’Abarabu, ngo ikizakuraho urujijo akaba ari ugukoresha iki kizamini.”
Juma Lokole, inshut ya hafi y’umuryango wa Diamond we yavuze ko ukuri ari uko umwana ari uwa Diamond.
Nyina wa Diamond avuga ko ibyo byo gupima DNA na bo barimo kubibona ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, gusa ngo bakwiye gutegereza bakereba ikizakurikiraho.
Twabibutsa ko nanone nyuma Diamond yo kubyarana na Zari muri 2015 umwana Latifah Nasibu ‘Tiffah Dangote’, nabwo havutse inkuru zivuga ko umwana atari uwe ubundi bajya gukoresha ikizamini cya DNA.

Vyoba vyama bikworohera kugamburukira abavyeyi bawe?— Rimwe na rimwe biragoye. Wari uzi ko Yezu yagamburukira Yehova hamwe n’abavyeyi biwe?— Akarorero kiwe karashobora kugufasha kugamburukira abavyeyi bawe n’igihe biba bitoroshe. Reka tubirabe.
Imbere y’uko Yezu aza ng’aha kw’isi, yabana mw’ijuru na Se wiwe Yehova. Yezu yaragize kandi abavyeyi ng’aha kw’isi. Bitwa Yozefu na Mariya. Woba uzi ingene vyagenze kugira babe abavyeyi biwe?—
Yehova yarakoze igitangaro ku buryo Yezu ashobora gukurira mu 
... 
 ko Mariya n’umugabo wiwe Yozefu babaye abavyeyi ba Yezu bo ng’aha kw’isi.
Igihe Yezu yari afise imyaka 12 gusa, yarakoze ikintu cerekanye ukuntu yakunda cane Se wiwe Yehova. Ivyo vyabaye igihe Yezu n’umuryango wiwe bagira urugendo rurerure baja i Yeruzalemu kw’ikoraniro ridasanzwe. Bariko barasubira inyuma, Yozefu na Mariya barabuze iyo Yezu ari. Urazi iyo yari ari?—
Ni kubera iki Yezu yari ku rusengero?
Yozefu na Mariya barasubiye i Yeruzalemu bihuta maze bararondera Yezu ahantu hose. Bari bah
...
gero?— Ni uko ng’aho yari gushobora kuhigira ivyerekeye Se wiwe Yehova. Yarakunda Yehova kandi yashaka kumenya ukuntu yomuhimbara. Mbere n’igihe yari amaze gukura akaba umugabo, Yezu yama agamburukira Yehova. Yezu yaragamburuka n’igihe bitari vyoroshe kandi bikaba vyamusaba ko ashikirwa n’imibabaro. Yezu yoba kandi yaragamburukira Yozefu na Mariya?— Bibiliya ivuga ko yabagamburukira.
Akarorero ka Yezu kakwigisha iki?— Urakwiye kugamburukira abavyeyi bawe, n’igihe biba bitoroshe. None uzobigira?—

Habaye umugabo akitwa Bimari, akaba afise umugore nawe nyene yiyita Bimari. Baraheza bavyara umwigeme. Uno mwana amaze gukura asabwa n’umuganwa. Ntibitevye, Isato, Ingwe, Inkuba n’Inkoma, na vyo bizana inka kumusaba. Bimari arazakira, aca agenda gushengera ibwami, abisa umugore ngo arabe ingene amara vyose.
Haheze imisi, ba bakwe baza gusaba indagano. Wa mugore ati :
- Sindabishobora ko umugabo atariho ari.
Ya nkuba, ya sato, ya ngwe na ya nkoma vyanka kuva murugo, kimwe cose giti :
- Simva aha 
... 
ora inkuba irapfa. Nawe ati :
- None rero ko wishe Inkuba, ngira ndaguhe umugeni.
Azana umubindi w’ubuki aha ya nkoma iranywa, iraborerwa, yinjira muri wa mubindi, na we arapfundikira, aracanira, ya nkoma irapfa. Bimari vy’umugabo asubira kw’izina ryiwe, za nka zose akomorera mu rugo, umukobwa atahira Umuganwa.
Ntibitevye, inzara iratera mugihugu. Umusi umwe Bimari abwira umugore ati :
- Ndagiye gutembera, mugabo ni wacumba usigaze amarobe abiri; rimwe ry’Imana irindi ry’iwanje. Iry’Imana urishi
...
amubwiye.
Umugabo aje, aterura rya buye agira ngo ni irobe, arasha, aca ata hasi aromboka arasohoka. Haheze umwanya Bimari arinjira, araramutsa nka kumwe atacigeze. Umugore amuha amazi yo gukaraba. Bimari ngo ayakozemwo intoke, arashinyiriza. Umugore aramubaza ati :
- Mbega ntuze aho wabaye iki?
Bimari ati:
- Mugitondo aho nariko ndashitura Maribori, nanyereye mu mase nkubita ibiganza mu gicaniro.
Amapfa yarinze ahera Bimari adasubiriye guhenda umugore.
Si je nohahera.

Umuvugizi w’umukuru w’igihugu Jean Claude KARERWA NDENZAKO amenyesha ko Reta y’Uburundi itazokwigera yemera kwicarana n’abashatse gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu kwezi kwa Rusama,umwaka wa 2015.
Mu gihe hariko haremeshwa ikiganiro n’abavugizi b’inzego zitandukanye za Reta, kuri uno wa gatanu igenekerezo rya 17 Ntwarante,umwaka wa 2017 ,mu ntara ya Makamba, umuvugizi w’umukuru w’igihugu yamenyesheje ko,Reta ishigikiye ibiganiro bibera hagati mu gihugu n’ibibera hanze y’igihugu.
Jean Claude KARERWA yavuze ariko ko mu biganiro vyatunganijwe mu gisagara ca Arusha, hibonekejemwo utunenge, mu bijanye no gutumira kuko hatumiwe imigambwe itemewe n’amategeko mu Burundi.
Umuvugizi w’umukuru w’igihugu yamenyesheje ko ibijanye n’ikiringo ca gatatu c’umukuru w’igihugu ataco Reta ikivugako, kuko sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwa nshingiro n’iyo mu karere zemeje ko ikiringo gikurikije amategeko.
Twaravuze tuti kiretse twese mutumaze nimba mubishoboye , tuzoganira nabakoze kudeta nabaturiye abantu, nayo abatagirwa nivyovyose twaramaze kwitangurira ibiganiro.

nga imikino yo mu matsinda.
Mu ibaruwa boherereje ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika, Andres Jorge Mbomio asaba CAF gukosora abasifuzi, bakaba bahagarika iyi myitwarire we avuga ko atari ubwa mbere biba.
Guinée Equatoriale ikaba iri gukina iri rushanwa kuko yaryakiriye nyamara yari yahagaritswe mu gihe kingana n’imyaka ibiri nyuma yo gukinisha umukinnyi itemerewe ubwo bashakaga itike iberekeza muri Maroc umwaka ushize.

Imikino iteganyijwe gukinwa

Umutekano uvurwa ko wagarutse, mu gice ca West Point, ku murwa mukuru w’igihugu ca Liberia, Monrovia, umusi umwe inyuma yuko igipolisi kirwanya imigumuko gitanye mu mitwe n’ababa mur’ico gice, bariko bagerageza kurwanya ikumirwa ryari ryagizwe, mu gice babamwo, mu gikoro k’ukurwanya ikwiragira ry’ikiza ca Ebola.
Abantu bane, canke barenga, barakomeretse, ku musi wa gatatu, igihe igipolisi carasa insoro, n’imyuka ibabaza mu maso, kugira gishwiragize abantu bari mu myiyerekano, bariko batera amabuye, bari bashavujwe n’iyugarwa ryabaye giturumbuka, ry’amabarabara yinjira n’ayasohoka, mu gice babamwo.
Muri ico gihe, abagira neza babiri b’Abanyamerika babiri, bari banduye umugera wa Ebola, mu gihugu ca Liberia, barakize, bakaba baravuye mu bitaro vyo mu gisagara ca Atlanta, mu bumanuko bwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Kenta Brantly, na Nancy Writebol, bavuriwe mu bitaro vyo kuri kaminuza ya Emory, n’imiti irimwo umuti ukiriko urageregezwa, uzwi kw’izina rya ZMapp.
Nibo bantu ba mbere bavuwe, hakoreshejwe uwo muti, abaganga bakaba batazi nimba warabafashije gukira.
Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi, O-M-S, ryamenyesheje kw'abantu igihumbi n'amajana atatu na mirongo itanu bapfuye, bahitanywe n’ikiza ca Ebola, mu karere ko muri Afrika yo mu burengero, amajana atanu na mirongo irindwi na batandatu muribo, bakaba bava mu gihugu ca Liberia.

tsinda rya Sauti Sol ryageze i Kigali aho rigiye gutaramira abanyarwanda, mu gitaramo gikomeye rirahuriramo na Charly na Nina ndetse na Bruce Melodie.
Iki gitaramo kiraba kuri uyu wa Gatanu kirasoza inama imaze iminsi ine ivuga ku iterambere ry’ibidukikije yiswe ‘Africa Green Growth Forum’ iteganyije no gutangirwamo ibihembo ku babaye indashyikirwa mu kubungabunga ibidukikije.
Iki gitaramo kirabera mu Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, guhera saa moya z’umugoroba.
Sauti Sol yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu gitaramo cya Fespad yatumiwemo ikagera i Kigali ariko igataha itaririmbye.
Aba basore basesekaye i Kigali mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu ahagana saa 6: 45’.
Iri tsinda ry’abanyakenya rimaze kubaka ibigwi, ryashinzwe mu 2005. Rigizwe n’abasore bane; Bien-Aimé Baraza, Willis Chimano, Savara Mudigi, Polycarp Otieno.
Rikunze gutumirwa cyane mu Rwanda ndetse mu kiganiro bigeze kugirana na televiziyo yo muri Ghana yitwa Zone Three 6, muri Werurwe uyu mwaka ryavuze ibihugu 10 ryisangamo kurusha ibindi ku Isi bitari Kenya bavukamo, u Rwanda ruza ku mwanya wa mbere.

Mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade Amahoro nyuma y’ibirori bikomeye byo gufungura amarushanwa, ikipe ya APR Fc yari imbere y’abafana bayo yaje gutsindwa igitego ku munota wa 10 w’umukino.
Ni igitego cyatsinzwe nyuma yo kutabasha kumvikana hagati ya ba myugariro b’ikipe ya APR Fc, ndetse n’umunyezamu Emery Mvuyekure, aho Usengimana Faustin yabaye nk’ugongana n’umunyezamu ku mupira wari uri mu kirere, umunyezamu uramucika ashatse kongera kuwufata Mohammed Hassan wa Ulinzi Stars ahita abonera ikipe ye igitego kimwe rukumbi ari nacyo cyanabonetse muri uyu mukino.

Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika imenyesha ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye batotezwa cane mu Burundi n’abajejwe intwaro hamwe n’abanyagihugu bakabura uwo bitura haba muri Leta canke mu butungane kugutinya kwicwa kuko bitemewe mu Burundi.Ibi biri mu ceregeranyo cuko agateka ka zina muntu kari kifashe mu mwaka wa 2023 caraye gisohowe na Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika
Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika yaraye isohoye icegeranyo cuko agateka ka zina muntu kari kifashe muri 2023,muri ico cegeranyo c’impapuro 55 Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika baragarutse kubahuza ibitsina babisangiye aho bahohoterwa cane n’abajejwe intwaro mbere bakabura uwo biura kubera gutinya guhanwa kuko abo bahuza ibitsina babisangiye mu Burundi batemewe kuko ico caha gihanwa n’amategeko y’uburundi.
Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika ivuga ko Leta y’uburundi itarigera ikora amatohoza canke ngo ihane aba batoteza uwo murwi w’abarundi kuko amategeko y’uburundi atavuga ingene abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bashobora guhanwa.
Guhera mu mwaka wa 2023 Umukuru w’igihugu Evarisye Ndayishimiye yaratangaje kumugaragaro ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bakwiye guterwa amabuye mbere yongera kubisubiramwo mu ntango za 2024 mbere agirako amenyesha ko no kubizira ashobora no kubizira hook yemera ako kabi kabishe mu gihugu arongoye.ico gihe ibihugu bitari bike haba kumugabane wa burayi na Amerika bariyamirije iyo mvugo ya varisto Ndayishimiye.

Umugabo witwa William Clyde Gibson ukomoka muri leta ya Indiana muri Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika yatunguye abantu ubwo yatangarizaga umunyamakuru ko abagore 3 ubushinjacyaha bwamushije ko yishe ndetse bikamuviramo gukatirwa igihano cy’urupfu ari bake kuko yishe benshi.
Ubwo uyu mwicanyi yari agiye kuganira n’uyu munyamakuru
Uyu kabuhariwe mu kwica abantu wakatiwe igihano cy’urupfu mu mwaka wa 2014,yabitangarije umunyamakuru witwa Sir Trevor McDonald ukorera ikinyamakuru ITV ubwo yamusuraga muri gereza afungiwemo mbere y’uko yicwa.
Yagize ati “bigitangira nicaga abagore gusa ariko byageze nyuma nica n’abagabo.Rwari uruhare rwa polisi gushaka uwishe abantu ntabwo nari kujya kubahamagara.Ntabwo bigeze babona abagabo nishe niyo mpamvu banshinje abagore gusa.”
Uyu mwicanyi ruharwa w’imyaka 60,yabwiye uyu munyamakuru ko icyamuteye kwica ari umugore we wamufashe ari kumuca inyuma agashaka guhamagara polisi niko kumuniga.
Uyu mugabo yabwiye uyu munyamakuru ko nta mutima wa kimuntu yumva agira ndetse atajya yicuza kuba yarishe abantu benshi nubwo yashinjwe kwica 3 gusa.

Umuhanzi Bebe Cool wo muri Uganda yatangaje ko yatsindiye akayabo nyuma yo gukora betting ko ikipe y’Ubufaransa izatsinda iya Croatia ku mukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cy’isi.
Ibi Bebe Cool yabitangarije mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abanyamakuru, ubwo yamamazaga ikigo gikora ibya betting muri Uganda maze ababwira ko ku mukino w’Ubufaransa na Croatia yari yashyizeho 2000 by’amadorari ya Amerika.
Yagize ati "Betting ntabwo ari ugutega gusa ahubwo ni imibare. Urugero nabaha ni uko nashyize amadorari 2000 ku Bufaransa ku mukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cy’isi, hanyuma nsindira 5000 by’amadorari ubwo batsindaga Croatia."
Uyu muhanzi aherutse mu Rwanda mu mpera za Kamena, 2018 ubwo yari yitabiriye igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction, akaba ari umwe mu bakomeye muri Uganda na East Africa muri rusange.

Ingabo z’Uburusiya zinjiye mu kigo gicumbitswemo n’abasirikare ba Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika muri Nijeri. Umwe mu bayobozi bakuru mu ngabo z’Amerika yabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru by’Abongereza, Reuters.
Ibyo bibaye nyuma y’uko ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare muri Nijeri busabye ingabo za Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika zigera ku 1000 kuva muri icyo gihugu. Nijeri yari ibanye neza n’Amerika bafatanyije kurwanya abahungabanya umutekano bahitana ababarirwa mu bihumbi abandi babarirwa muri za miliyoni bagahunga. Gusa umwaka ushize nyuma y’ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi muri icyo gihugu byose byarahindutse.
Umwe mu basirikare bakuru utashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa yavuze ko ingabo z’Uburusiya zitivangaga n’iz’Amerika zasanze muri icyo kigo. Yavuze ko zinjiye mu gihangari cyazo ku kibuga cy’indage cya gisirikare kiri hafi y’ikibuga mpuzamahanga cya Diori Hamani i Niamey mu murwa mukuru wa Nijeri.
Ibyakozwe n’igisirikare cy’Uburusiya byatumye habaho kwegerana cyane hagati yazo n’iz’Amerika mu gihe umubano w’ibihugu byombi mu bya diplomasi n’ibya gisirikare utameze neza. Bituma kandi hibazwa ku bazasigara bakoresha ibyo ingabo z’Amerika zahubatse ni zimara kuhava.
Amerika n’inshuti zayo byategetswe gukura ingabo zabyo mu bihugu bimwe byo muri Afurika byabayemo ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi ababufashe bashaka kwitandukanya na guverinoma z’Amerika n’ibihugu by’Uburayi. Uretse Nijeri ingabo z’Amerika zamaze kuva muri Cadi mu minsi ishize mu gihe Ubufaransa bwirukanywe muri Mali na Burkina Faso

KCCA yo mu gihugu cya Uganda yamaze gusinyisha rutahizamu w’umugande Davis Kasirye amasezerano y’umwaka umwe, akaba yarakiniye Rayon Sports.
Davis Kasirye wakiniraga ikipe y’igisirikare cya Uganda UPDF FC yamaze gusinya amasezerano y’umwaka umwe muri KCCA.
Uyu rutahizamu w’umugande wanyuze mu Rwanda muri Rayon Sports mu mwaka 2016 ,akayivamo yerekeza aring Club Motema Pembe yo muri Congo imuguze hafi Milioni 25 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Uyu mugabo ntabwo yigize ahgirwa naho yanyuze kuko nyuma yo kuva muri Rayon Sports yanyuze mu makipe menshi arimo Vipers SC, DC Motema Pembe (DRC), Zesco United (Zambia) UPDF fc na URA FC.
Davis Kasirye wakiniye Rayon Sports mu 2016 , akaba atazava mu mitwe ya bakunzi ba APR FC kuko niwe uheruka gutsinda iyi kipe ibitego 3 wenyine mu mukino umwe.

Donald Trump wayoboye Amerika yatawe muri yombi
Donald Trump yakoze amateka yo kuba uwahoze ari Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika watawe muri yombi na polisi ndetse agafungirwa muri Gereza yo muri Atlanta ku mugoroba wo kuri wa Kane iminota micye mbere yo kurekurwa.
Trump ukurikiranweho icyaha cyo gushaka guhindura ibyavuye mu matora yo mu 2020, yanditswe mu gitabo cya gereza ya Fulton nk’imfungwa No. P01135809, afatwa ifoto areba muri camera ndetse n’ibikumwe yinjizwa muri kasho amaramo iminota 20 mbere yo kurekurwa nk’uko tubikesha Reuters.
Mbere yo kwinjira mu ndege ye bwite ku kibuga cy’indege cya Hartsfield-Jackson cya Atlanta amaze kurekurwa, yongeye kuvuga ko iki cyaha ubushinjacyaha bumukurikiranyeho ndetse n’ibindi byose ashinjwa bishingiye kuri politiki.
Yatangarije abanyamakuru ati: "Ibyabereye hano ni igitutsi ku butabera." "Nta kibi nakoze, kandi abantu bose barabizi."
Trump, ufite imyaka 77, yamaze kwinjira mu mateka nk’uwahoze ari perezida wa mbere wa Amerika ukurikiranyweho ibyaha, nubwo agiteganya kongera kwiyamamaza mu matora ya perezida umwaka utaha.

Manishimwe Djabel arifuza kuba yatandukana n’iyi kipe akaba yakwerekeza gukina hanze y’u Rwanda.
Amakuru avuga ko uyu mukinnyi usigaje amasezerano y’imyaka 2 muri iyi kipe yaba yegereye ubuyobozi bwa APR FC asaba kuba yamurekura akajya gukina hanze y’u Rwanda.
Manishimwe Djabel yifuza kuba yakwerekeza gukina mu gihugu cya Libya aho hari ikipe imwifuza mu gihe yaba yiteguye yahita asinya.
Djabel yaramaze imyaka 4 muri iyi kipe y’ingabo z’igihugu amakuru avuga ko kuri we yumva igihe cyo gukina mu Rwanda cyarangiye bityo yumva yajya gukina hanze y’u Rwanda.

Iyo migambwe ikamenyesha ko itangazwa y’agacerere kuri ubwo bwicanyi kerekanwe n’ibihugu vyo hanze hamwe n’amashirahamwe avuga ko aharanira agateka ka zina muntu.

Nk’uko bitangazwa n’abayobozi bo mu nzego z’ubuzima, byari byarateguwe ko hazabaho gukingira ahagana ku musozo wa gahunda ya ‘Guma mu Rugo’ y’iminsi 10.
Dr Sabin Nsanzimana, Umuyobozi mukuru wa RBC yagize ati “ Iki ni ikindi gikorwa cyo gupima Covid-19 mu buryo bwa rusange, intego ni ugupima nibura 15% by’abantu bakuru, ariko twibanda cyane ku bakora mu nzego zitanga serivisi zituma ibyago byo kwandura biri hejuru ya 5 %”.
Uburyo bwo guhitamo ingo zikorerwamo ibyo bikorwa byo gupima Covid-19, ku
... 
 w’abanduye mu Tugari twa Gasagara na Gacaca mu Murenge wa Rusororo mu Karere ka Gasabo.
Ibyo bije nyuma yo gupima Covid-19 mu buryo bwa rusange mu tundi turere umunani natwo turi muri Guma mu Rugo.
Dr Nsanzimana yagize ati “Twapimye 5% by’abaturage muri Kagari no mu turere two hirya no hino mu gihugu turi muri gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo ndetse n’abantu 100 bo mu turere tutari muri Guma mu Rugo”.

Dj Shiru ni umwe mu bacuranzi bavangavanga imiziki babahanga cyane mu gihugu cya Uganda uyu kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Ukuboza 2018 yageze mu mujyi wa Kigali, Uyu mugabo aje mu Rwanda mu gitaramo cya Silent Disco kizabera mu mujyi wa Kigali ahitwa Chillax Bar&Lounge.
Iki gitaramo uyu mugabo aje gucurangamo ni igitaramo gitegerejwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Ukuboza 2018 muri Chillax Bar&Lounge aho azaba afatanya nabandi ba Djs bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo Dj Pius, Dj Khadir,DJ Phil Peter, Dj Lenzo,Dj Mupenzi na Nep Djs. kwinjira muri iki gitaramo ni ibiciro bimaze kumenyekana aho kwinjira muri Silent Disco bizaba ari amafaranga ibihumbi bitanu (5000frw).
Dj Shiru udakunze kuza mu Rwanda gucuranga ariko akaba umwe mu bahanga bavangavanga imiziki hano mu karere cyane cyane iwabo muri Uganda aje mu Rwada muri ibi bitaramo nyuma ya VJ Spinny umaze kubaka izina muri Silent Disco uherutse gukorera igitaramo i Kigali ndetse cyanitabiriwe bikomeye.
Dj Shiru ubwo yari ageze i Kigali yakiriwe neza

Ivyo yabishikirije mu nama ubwo bushikiranganji bwatunganije buriko busigurira abarongoye amashengero atandukanye ibijanye n’ivyahinyanyuwe mw’ibwirizwa shingiro.
Umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n’inyigisho zo gukunda igihugu Pascal BARANDAGIYE yamenyesheje abo barongozi b’amashengero ko ico kiringo giheze ishengero idakwije ivyangombwa izoca yugarwa.
Muriyo nama, uyo mushikiranganji yabwiye abo barongozi kw’intererano y’amatora yo mu mwaka wa 2020 ku mashengero barongoye ari ngombwa.
Abarongozi bitavye iyo nama bamenyesheje ko intererano yabo izotangwa kuko nabo nyene ibijanye n’amatora bibaraba.

Perezida wa Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni kuri uyu munsi yageze mu Rwanda aho aje kwitabira inama y’Abakuru b’Ibihugu na za Guverinoma zo mu Muryango wa Commonwealth , CHOGM aho yaje avuye ku mupaka wa Gatuna ahagejejwe n’indege ya kajugujugu nyuma agafata imodoka yerekeza Kigali.
Akigera mu mugi wa Kigali yasanze abaturage benshi ku mihanda biteguye kumwakira. Mu nyubako zitandukanye za Nyabugogo abaturage bari ikivunge bapepera uyu muyobozi.
Umutekano wari wakajijwe mu mihanda kuva Nyabugogo uzamuka Muhima ugakomeza mu mujyi ndetse no mugice Kimihurura umutekano wari wakajijwe.
Uyu munyacyubahiro akimara kubona ibibaye ku mihanda ya Kigali,byamwanze munda ubundi asimbukira ku rukuta rwe raw Twitter ashimira abanyarwanda uko bamwakiriye.
Yagize ati “Nageze i Kigali mu Rwanda, aho nitabiriye Inama ya 26 y’Abakuru b’Ibihugu na za Guverinoma zigize Commonwealth (CHOGM). Ndashimira Abanyarwanda ku ikaze mwampaye. Murakoze cyane!
Museveni yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu 2017 ubwo habaga ibirori byo kurahira kwa Perezida Kagame,gusa hamaze iminsi hashakwa igisubizo cy’umubano utari umeze neza wibihugu byombi ,ngo byongere bigenderane aho ubona ko ibimaze gukorwa ari byinshi, kandi bikaba bitanga ikizere cy’umubano mwiza.

Intandaro y'itanga imihoho rya bamwe mu bategetsi ba BBC, n'ikiganiro kijanye n'uruhara ruvurwa ku wahoze ar'umukozi wa BBC mu kiganiro ca Newsnight, Jimmy Savile, yitavye Imana umwaka uheze, akekwako yahohoteye abana.
Itanga imihoho ry'abo babiri rikurikiye iry'umuyobozi mukuru wa BBC George Entwistle.
Mr Entwistle yakuye meza inyuma y'ikiganiro caciye kuri Television ya BBC, cagiriza uwahoze ar'umunyapolitique ko afise uruhara mu guhohotera abana.
Umuyobozi mukuru nfatakibanza wa BBC Tim Davie, yavuze ko aza gusobanura ibijanye n'ibura ry'amabwiriza atomoye mu gutunganya amakuru ndetse no gukwirikirana neza uburyo akorwa.

Abashingwamanza bo mu Burundi ngo baragira ibibazo bijanye n’umwuga wabo. Uturorero ngo ni nko kutemererwa kuraba uwo aburanira mu gihe aba ari mw’ibojero canke uguca urubanza ukunyuranye n’uko umushingwamanza aba yarukurikiranye, n’ibindi.
Ivyo ni ivyashikirijwe n’uwuserukira urwego rw’abashingwamanza i Bujumbura Maître Jean de Dieu Muhuzenge kuri uyu wa gatanu igenekerezo rya 11 Nyakanga umwaka w’2020 mu gihe yari aramitse yugurura icese umwaka wahariwe ubutungane w’2020 ushira uw’2021.
Maître Jean de Dieu Muhuzenge asaba umuntu uwo ari we wese yaba muto canke mukuru kwubahiriza urwego rw’abashingwamanza hamwe n’abacamanza ngo kuko igihugu kitagira ubutungane ntigiheza ngo gitere imbere.

Kubera umusaruro muke Real Madrid yagaragaje muri shampiyona ya Espagne uyu mwaka aho iri ku mwanya wa gatatu, benshi ntibayihaga amahirwe yo kwikura imbere ya Juventus mu Butaliyani mu mukino ubanza wa ¼ cya UEFA Champions League.
Zinedine Zidane n’ikipe ye imaze kwegukana ibikombe 12 by’iri rushanwa birimo bibiri biheruka yatwaye yikurikiranya, yongeye kwerekana ko ari umwami ku mugabane w’u Burayi kuko byasabye iminota itatu gusa kugira ngo Cristiano Ronaldo afungure amazamu kuri Allianz Stad
... 
kidasanzwe yari atsinze ikipe yabo.
Ibyago bya Juventus byabaye bibi cyane ku munota wa 66 rutahizamu igenderaho wari wagerageje no guha akazi kenshi ubwugarizi bwa Real Madrid, Paulo Dybala abona ikarita y’umutuku asohoka mu kibuga byatumye atazanagaragara mu mukino wo kwishyura mu cyumweru gitaha.
Real Madrid yatangiye kwidagadura mu kibuga hagati ihanganye n’abakinnyi 10, ku munota wa 72 myugariro Marcelo atsinda igitego cya gatatu abanje kunyura hagati ya ba myugariro batatu ba Juventus arag
...
bitego 2-1.
Sevilla niyo yatangiye isatira cyane ibona uburyo bwinshi ibupfusha ubusa ariko Pablo Sarabia aza gufungura amazamu ku munota wa 31 mbere yo kujya kuruhuka, Bayern irishyura ku gitego cyitsinzwe na Jesus Navas mu gice cya kabiri Thiago Alcantara ashyiramo icya kabiri.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu saa 20:45 hategerejwe undi mukino ukomeye cyane uza guhuza amakipe abiri yo mu Bwongereza, Manchester City yasuye Liverpool naho FC Barcelona ikaza kuba iri mu rugo yakiriye AC Roma.

Hashize imyaka 7 Jose Mourinho avuye muri Inter Milan yerekeza mw’ikipe ya Real Madrid nayo yaje kuvamo asubira mw’ikipe ya Chelsea nayo akayivamo aza muri Manchester United agiye kumaramo saison 2 zose.
Jose Mourinho akaba yagarutse ku minsi ye nyuma mw’ikipe ya Real Madrid mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Record,akaba yatangaje ko akazi ke ari uguhindura ikipe agiyemo mw’ikipe yugarira cyane ibintu yakoze i Madrid ari nabyo ari gukora muri Man Utd.Gusa kubera guhangana hagati y’ikipe ya Barca na Real ntago bituma umusaruro w’umutoza ugaragara ari yo mpamvu yasabye abayobozi ba Madrid ko bamureka agasubira muri Chelsea nubwo bashakaga ko aguma muri Real Madrid.
Jose Mourinho muri saison ya mbere yatwaye igikombe cy’umwami Copa del Rey,iya kabiri atwara la liga bari bamaze imyaka 5 bategereje iya nyuma irangira nabi ari nabwo yahise asubira mu Bwongereza.

KENYA:Raila Odinga utarakunze guhirwa n’intebe y’ubuyobozi akomeje gusetsa imikara nyuma yo gutanga ikirego ngo amatora asubirwemo
Raila Odinga utarakunze guhirwa n’intebe y’ubuyobozi byamaze gutangazwa ko nyuma yo gutsindwa mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu kuri ubu ngo yamaze gutanga ikirego mu rukiko rw’ikirenga kugirango haburizwemo ibyavuye mu matora.
Mu minsi ishize nibwo hamenyekanye ko bwana William Ruto wahoze ari Visi Perezida ku ngoma ya Uhuru Kenyatta ariwe wegukanye umwanya w’umukuru w’igihugu nyuma yo guhigika bwana Raila Odinga.
Kugeza magingo aya abanyamategeko bunganira bwana Raila Odinga batangaje ko bamaze gutanga ikirego ku rubuga rwa murandasi.
Umunyamategeko witwa Daniel Maanzo yavuze ko icyo kirego cyo kuburizamo ibyavuye mu matora cya nyakubahwa Odinga cyamaze kugera mu maboko y’urwego rw’ubucamanza.
Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere Raila Odinga yanga ibyavuye mu matora kuko no ku ngoma y’uwari Perezida wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta nabwo habayeho gusubiramo amatora ariko nyuma Kenyatta yaje gutsinda ayo matora asubiwemo nubwo bwose Odinga nabwo yari yatanze ikirego.

KINSHASA, CONGO – Ku minsi 11/11/2017 Leta ya Afrika y’epfo yatangaje urupfu rw’umwe mubasirikare babo barinda umutekano muri Congo, Nomathemba Ngeleka.
Amakuru atugeze ho aravuga yuko Nomathemba Ngeleka, w’imyaka 27 y’amavuka ukomoka muri Afrika y’epfo yarashwe n’umukunzi we ubwo bari mw’ikambi ya gisirikare aho bari basanzwe bakorera. Uyu mukunzi wa Ngeleka bari bamaranya imyaka 5 bakundanye.
Umuvugizi wa SANDF(The South African National Defence Force), General Mafi Mgobozi yavuze yuko uyu musirikare warashwe ndetse agahita yitaba Imana umubiri we uzajanwa iwabo muri Afrika y’epfo kwa Zulu-Natal.
Ngeleka, yinjiye igisirikare, muri infantry batayo ya 5, mumwaka wa 2011, muri Afrika y’epfo ahitwa Ladysmith.
Nyuma yo kurasa umukunzi we, uyu muhungu yagerageje kwirasa kugira ngo nawe apfe ariko ntibyashoboka kuko yirashe arakomereka, bahise bamwaka imbunde ye. Ubu akaba ari mubitaro aho ari gukurikiranwa n’abaganga.
Gira Ico Uvuze kuri iyi nkuru...

Nyina wa Zuchu yasubije abibaza niba Diamond yararongoye umukobwa we mu ibanga rikomeye
Hashize iminsi havugwa inkuru y’uko Diamond yaba yararongoye Zuchu mu ibanga rikomeye, Gusa nyina w’uyu mukobwa yaciye amazimwe ndetse avuga ko atazigera amufata nk’umukwe.
Diamond Platnumz washinze inzu ya WCB ifasha abahanzi barimo na Zuchu, Hari hashize iminsi bivugwa ko aba bombi baba barakoze ubukwe mu ibanga rikomeye.
Nyina ubyara Zuchu, Khadija Omar Abdallah Kopa we yavuze ko atifuza kubona Diamond nk’umukwe gusa ko yiteguye undi mugabo wese warongora umukobwa we.
Mu kiganiro na Mbego TV yagize ati:" Umugabo wese uzifuza gufata ukuboko umukobwa wanjye ariko utari Diamond, Uwo ntakibazo azantera dore ko nkeneye n’umukwe, Gusa iby’uko bakoze ubukwe byo ni inkuru nshya, Kuko umukobwa wanjye ntiyigeze ashyingirwa, ntabwo ari mu rukundo ndetse nta mugabo n’umwe aranyereka."
Nubwo nyina wa Zuchu ahakana urukundo rw’aba bombi, Ni kenshi Diamond yagaragaye ari kumwe n’uyu mukobwa bishimanye ndetse bakagirana n’ingendo zo hanze y’igihugu.
Khadija, Nyina wa Zuchu
Si ibi gusa kuko mu kwezi k’Ukwakira 2022, Zuchu yahaye Diamond impano y’umukufi ushushanyijeho isura ye, ufite agaciro ka miliyoni imwe n’ibihumbi magana atanu by’Amashilingi ya Tanzania, Diamond nawe yaje kumuha imitako yo mu menyo ya zahabu.
Umukufi Zuchu yahaye Diamond
Ni kenshi bakunze kugaragara nk’abakunzi
Zuchu na Diamond i Paris
Zuchu na Diamond bagiranye ibihe byiza nubwo bivugwa ko badakundana

Urubanza rwa Hosni Moubarak ruzosubirwamwo kuko sentare yasanze hari amategeko atakurikijwe neza muri urwo rubanza. Moubarak yagirizwamwo ivyaha vyo kunyegeza ubutunzi bw’igihugu, kumwe n’abahungu biwe babiri.
Sentare yasanze hari amategeko atakurikijwe neza muri urwo rubanza Moubarak yarerwamwo ivyaha vyo kurya ibiturire kumwe n’abahungu biwe babiri. Umushingwamanza wa Hosni Moubarak, avuga ko yizeye ko ashobora kurekurwa vuba, akava aho apfungiwe mu mu gisagara c’i Cairo.
Mu kwezi kwa Munyonyo umwaka uheze w’2014, Moubarak yari yaciriwe umunyororo w’imyaka itatu, arerwa kunyuruza imiriyoni 18 yari gukoresha mu gusanura inyubakwa ziwe.
Mu kwezi kwa Munyonyo Sentare yari yahevye icaha, bamwagiriza co kwica abari mu myiyerekano, urubanza bari bamukatiye gufungwa ubuzima bwiwe bwose, ariko Hosni Mubarak akaba yaciye agumizwa mw’ibohero bitumwe n’ico caha yagirizwa co kurya ruswa.

Ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Handball mu Rwanda (FERWAHAND) ryimuye shampiyona y’abagore yagombaga gutangira kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 26 Werurwe 2016 ikazaba nyuma y’ibiruhuko by’abanyeshuri.
Ngarambe Jean Paul Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa FERWAHAND yavuze ko bimuye shampiyona y’abagore ikazakinwa nyuma y’ibiruhuko by’amashuri yisumbuye, ati “amakipe yose ari muri shampiyona y’abagore muri Handball agizwe n’ibigo by’amashuri kandi ubu abanyeshuri bagiye kujya mu biruhuko kandi batabona uko bakina imikino yabo batari ku bigo”.
Amakipe agize shampiyona y’abagore ya 2016 ni: Appegi TSS, Hanika TSS, GS Mwendo, UR CE, Duha CS, GS Muyange ndetse na ES Mukingi.

AZAM TV yo muri Tanzania yongeye kugaruka muri shampiyona y’u Rwanda ihera ku ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports aho bumvikanye ku masezerano yo gukorana mu gihe cy’imyaka 4.
Amakuru agera kuri Teradignews avuga ko impande zombi zishyira umukono kuri aya masezerano kuri uyu wa Gatanu. AZAM iraha Kiyovu Sports Miliyoni 132.
Kiyovu Sports ibarizwa ku Mumena izajya yambara imipira iriho ikirango cya AZAM imbere mu gituza nibamara gusinyana aya masezerano, gusa ntibiratangazwa niba AZAM TV izaba ifite uburengan
... 
ZAM yahagaritse kwerekana imikino ya shampiyona y’u Rwanda nyuma yo kutumvikana na FERWAFA.
Ni nyuma y’uko kuri uyu wa Gatatu AZAM yagiranye amasezerano na APR FC ifite ibikombe 17 bya shampiyona, ni amasezerano y’imyaka 4 yasize uru ruganda rukomeye ruzishyura iyi kipe y’ingabo z’igihugu amafaranga y’u Rwanda agera kuri miliyoni 228.
Bimwe mu bikubiye muri ayo masezerano, harimo ko APR FC izajya yambara imyenda iriho ikirango cya Azam.
Kwamamaza ibikorwa by’uru ruganda ku mikino iyi kipe yakiri
...
uganda rwahabwa uburenganzira bwo gucuruza bimwe mu byo rukora ku mikino ya APR FC cyane cyane ibinyobwa.
AZAM Group ni uruganda rukomeye mu karere k’Africa y’Iburasirazuba rukora amafarani, amazi meza yo kunywa, imitobe, n’ibindi bicuruzwa bitandukanye.
Banafite kandi televiziyo ikorera mu gihugu cya Tanzania ikaba yarigeze kwagura ibikorwa byayo mu karere ikajya yerekana imipira muri Uganda, U Rwanda n’u Burundi, ariko kuri ubu isigaye yerekana mu buryo buhoraho shampiyona ya Tanzania yonyine.

Prezida Paul Kagame w’u Rwanda, yatangaje ko igihugu cye n’Ubufaransa bifite amahirwe yo kunoza umubano.
Yabivugiye ejo mu kiganiro yahaye abanyamakuru bo mu Bufaransa aho kuri uyu wa kabiri hatangiye inama ihuza Prezida w’icyo gihugu Emmanuel Macron n’abandi bakuru b’ibuhugu 21.
Iyo nama irasuzumira hamwe inzira zanyurwa kugirango ubukungu bw’ibihugu by’Afrika bwazahajwe n’icyorezo cya Covid-19, buzahurwe n'izindi ngingo zinyuranye zireba isi muri iki gihe.
Ibikubiye mu ngingo zitandukanye Perezida Paul Kagame yaganiriye n'itangazamakuru ryo mu Bufaransa twabyegeranirijwe na Venuste Nshimiyimana, umunyamakuru w'ijwi ry'Amerika ukorera i Londres mu Bwongereza.

Bwana Maduro, umugabo yagenywe na nyakwigendera Hugo Shavez kumusubirira, bivugwa ko yatsinze amatora arushije mukeba wiwe munsi ya 2%.
Uwaserukiye uruhande rutavuga rumwe na leta mur'ayo matora Henrique Capriles, yavuze ko atazokwemera ivyavuye mu matora.
Avuga ko umurwi umushigikiye ufise urutonde rw' ibigera ku 3000 bitagenze neza asaba ko guharura vyosubirwamwo.
Bwana Maduro yasavye abanyagihugu gutekana, n'uko ivyavuye mu matora vyokubahirizwa.
Amatora yatumweko inyuma y'urupfu rwa Hugo Chavez yahitanywe n'ingwara ya Cancer kuwa 5 ukwezi kwa gatatu.
Bwana Maduro, yahoze ari umushoferi wa bus, yari yagenywe na Hugo Chavez kumusubirira, yatahukanywe amajwi 50,7% mur'aya matora , nayo bwana Capriles aronka 49,1%.

Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zatangajeko zigiye gufasha perezida wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, Felex Kisekedi gukemura ikibazo cya ruswa ndetse n’umutekano muke bikomeje kurangwa muri cyo gihugu.
Ibi byatangajwe n’uhagarariye inyungu za Amerika muri iki gihugu, Mike Hammer uhamyako ibyo bibazo bya ruswa n’umutekano muke ngo bizitira abashoramari baba bifuza gushora imira muri iki gihugu ariko batekereza kku mutekano w’ibyabo bagahita bacika intege.
Mike Hammer kandi yabwiye urubyiruko rwo muri Kongo ko Amerika ishyigikira umuyobozi wa bo mu rugamba rwo guhashya ibi bibazo ndetse no kugera kuri gahunda zose perezida Tshisekedi afitiye igihugu muri iyi manda ye.
Ibihugu byinshi bikomeje kugaragaza inyota yo gufatanya na perezida mushya wa Kongo Felix Tshisekedi wagiyeho asimbuye Joseph Kabila.
Igihugu cya Kongo cyabaye indiri y’imitwe yitwaje intwaro, aho usanga ari imbarutso y’umutekano muke muri iki gihugu ndetse no mu bihugu by’ibituranye.

Umuririmvyikazi afise indirimbo zikunzwe cane hano muri Leta zunze ubumwe za America ” Aline Vyuka, muri kano kanya afise umubabaro udasanzwe nyuma yo kwunva inkuru ibabaje yurupfu rwuwahora ari umuhinyanyuzi akomeye cane mu gihugu cu Burundi ( Dr Jack )
Nkuko uno muririmvyikazi yavyivugiye, we yavuze ko bibabaje cane kubura umuntu nka Dr Jack naburya ko atanumusi numwe tuzosubira kumubona kwisi, ikindi naco yagiriyeho amusabira ku Mana ko yomwakira mu bwami bwayo bwo mwijuru.
Aline Vyuka yagize ati : Birababaje cane kubura umuntu nka Dr jack tutagisubira kumubona, u Burundi bubuze intwari mu music , ntawo narinzi ariko wumvirije indirimbo yahinyanyura yari intwari mu music wacu eka nahandi hose numva mbabaye cane, Imana imwakire , kuko aha kwisi atari iwacu twese duhaca turengana . R.I.P Dr Jack
UBM News twobibutsa ko uno muhinyanyuzi Dr Jack ko yari umwe muba Producer bakomeye cane mu Burundi, ishingurwa ryiwe ryo kumusezera ubwanyuma rikaba ryabaye uyu munsi.

APR FC yaraye ikoze operation ikomeye cyane, isinyisha umukinnyi w’umunya Mali witwa Mamadou Lamine Bah mbere y’uko afata indege ijya mu Bufaransa.
Amakuru dukesha umunyamakuru Sam Karenzi wa Fine FM uzwiho gutangaza inkuru z’imbere muri APR FC, yavuze ko uyu musore wambara nimero 10 w’ikipe y’igihugu ya Mali yasinye mu minota 30 mbere yo gufata indege berekeza mu Bufaransa gukina imikino ya Olympique.
Nyamukandagiramukibuga ikomeje gushaka abakinnyi bakomeye muri Africa, ikaba iri mu mikino ya CECAFA Kagame Cup muri Tanzania, aho yaraye yitwaye neza itsinda umukino wa mbere Singida igitego 1-0.

Imyiyerekano yitiriwe ”Bayi CPI” yari yitabwe n’abantu isinzi
Ukuva mu gitiri c’ibihugu bihurikiye muri sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha kw’Uburundi kwatumye abarundi isinzi mu gihugu cose bazindukira mu myiyerekano y’ukwigina intsinzi y”’ukwikukira kw’Uburundi ubugira kabiri”, ”Bayi CPI” kuri uno wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 28 Gitugutu.
Iyo myiyerekano mu gisagara ca Bujumbura ikaba yari yitabwe n’abantu isinzi uhereye ku banyacubahiro batandukanye, abajejwe intwaro, abashingantahe, abapfasoni hamwe n’urwaruka tutibagiye abasanzwe bunguruza abantu n’ibintu bakoresheje amapikpiki, ama tuk-tuk hamwe n’amakinga.
Uburundi bukaba bubaye ubwa mbere bwashikirije bukongera bugashira mu ngiro ingingo y’ukuvavanura n’iyo sentare y’i Rahe mu gihe ibindi bihugu bibiri vyari vyashigikiye ico ciyumviro c’ukuva muri iyo sentare arivyo igihugu ca Gambiya hamwe na Afrika y’epfo vyahavuye vyisubirako mu nyuma bikagumamwo.

Umukobwa wa Perezida w’ u Rwanda Ange Kagame yihanganishije abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ababwira ko abagiye basize ababakundaga kandi ko bazahora iteka babibuka.
Ni mu gihe Abanyarwanda n’ inshuti z’ u Rwanda bibuka ibihe bikomeye by’ akababaro Abanyarwanda banyuzemo mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu myaka 24 ishize aho abarenga miliyoni imwe bambuwe ubuzima mu minsi ijana gusa.
Mu butumwa yashyize kuri Twitter yagize ati "Ku bo dukunda twabuze mu myaka 24 ishize, turabubaha kandi tuzakora iteka tubibuka".
Ange Kagame kandi yongeye gukomoza ku magambo ajyanye no kwibuka yigeze kuvugwa na se, ariwe Perezida w’ u Rwanda Paul Kagame aho yagize ati "Bagerageje kuduhamba ariko ntabwo bari baziko turi imbuto"
Yakomeje yihanganisha abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, bakanyura mu buzima bubabaje cyane ababwira ko Abanyarwanda bari kumwe nabo.

Covid 19 irimo iriyongera cyane mu Buhinde. Afrika ifite impungenge cyane ku byayigiraho ingaruka.
Kuri uyu wa kane, umubare w'abandura Covid 19 ku munsi warenze miliyoni 18 mu Buhinde. Naho abapfa buri munsi barenze 3,600.
Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga, Harsh Vardhan Shringla, yatangaje ko bakeneye cyane cyane umwuka wa Oxygene wo gufasha abarwayi guhumeka. Avuga ko ibihugu 40 byo ku isi byemeye kubibafashamo. Muri byo harimo Leta zunze ubumwe z'Amerika yohereje imfashanyo z'agaciro k'amadol
... 
yoni ijana.
Dr. John Nkengasong, umuyobozi w'ikigo cy'Afurika gishinzwe kurwanya no gukumira indwara, Africa CDC, yatangarije abanyamakuru uyu munsi ko ibibera mu Buhinde byamurenze. Yavuze ko Afurika ikwiye kwitegura cyane hakiri kare kuko nayo ishobora kugira ingorane zimwe n'iz'Ubuhinde.
Dr. Nkengasong yagize, ati: "Abaturage b'Afurika bajya kungana n'ab'Ubihinde. Inzego z'ubuganga z'Afurika nazo zifite intege nke. Nta bakozi bahagije bazirimo. Oxygene iri muri Afrika naho ntihagije."
Ku bire
...
andi, Afurika igendera ku Buhinde cyane. AstraZeneca ikoreshwa muri Afrika ikorerwa mu Buhinde. Igera muri Afurika inyuze muri Covax, gahunda ya OMS, ishami ry'Umuryango w'Abibumbye ryita ku buzima, yo guha ku buntu inkingo za Covid mu bihugu 92 bikennye. Nkengasong, ati: "Simbona ukuntu Ubuhindi bwakohereza inkingo mu mahanga niba nabwo budashoboye kwihaza."
Kugeza ubu, inkingo miliyoni 17 ni zo zonyine zimaze guhabwa abaturage b'Afrika ku bantu miliyari na miliyoni 300 bayituye.

Umurepublicain akomeye afise ubwoba ku ntwaro ya Trump
Umutegetsi akomeye mu mugambwe w’abarepublicain avuga ko afitiye ubwoba kazoza k’abuzukuru biwe indwe ku butegetsi bwa Donald Trump.
Christine Todd Whitman, yari arongoye ikigo kijejwe gukingira ibidukikije (EPA) ku butegetsi bwa George W Bush, yagiriza Trump atitaho ibigaragazwa n’ubushakashatsi.
Yanagabishije ko ugushaka guca iruhande ya politike igenga ibidukikije bishobora kubangamira kazoza k’isi.
Abashigikiye Trump bivugira ko amategeko agenga ibidukikije ahungabanya ubudandaji.
Umupfasoni Todd Whitman yavuze ko Amerika itegerezwa kurondera uburyo bwo guteza imbere ubudandaji bitagize ingaruka mbi kw’isi tubako.
Ido n’ido ya polititike ya Trump ku bidukikije ntiragaragara neza, ariko abantu biwe bategekanya kwongereza umwimbu w’amakara, kwugurura imihora mishasha y’igitoro no kurekurira abantu kwimba ubutare canke kwimba igitoro mw’ibahari Arctique.
Muri politike, bavuze ko bashobora kuva mu masezerano agenga ibidukikije kw’isi, bateye akagere umugambi wa prezida Obama w’ubutegetsi nta gatosi, hamwe rero no gukuraho ubushikiranganji bujejwe ibidukikije co kimwe n’ikigo EPA ubwaco.

Ibendera rya Loni ryururukijwe kubera abakozi bayo biciwe muri Gaza
Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 13 Ugushyingo 2023, ni bwo ku byicaro by’Umuryango w’Abibumbye UN mu bihugu bitandukanye by’umugabane wa Asia, amabendera y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye (Loni) yururukijwe agezwa mu cya kabiri nyuma yo kubura abakozi baherutse kwicirwa muri Gaza.
Abakozi b’uyu muryango kandi bafashe umunota umwe wo kuzirikana bagenzi babo baguye mu bitero bya Bombe muri Gaza, aho ingabo za Isiraheli zagabye igitero zikurikir
... 
eijing.

Ni ibitero byabaye ubwo aba bakozi ba Loni bari mu bikorwa byo gufasha abaturage babayeho nabi kubera intambara mu ntara ya Gaza muri Palestine.
Ibiro by’Umuryango w’Abibumbye byita ku mbabare byiyemeje kugoboka abari mu kaga muri Palestine (UNRWA) byatangaje ko abakozi babyo barenga 100 bamaze kwicirw
...
meye ziterwa na Isiraheli, zikomeje kwica abantu benshi mu majyepfo y’iki gihugu.

Kugeza ubu abantu barenga ibihumbi 11 biganjemo abasivili ni bo bamaze gupfira muri Gaza kubera ko Isiraheli ikomeje kubamishaho ibisasu byinshi ndetse ikaba yaranagose abawutuyemo.

Umunyezamu w’Umutaliyani umaze imyaka itari mike mu kibuga Gianluigi Buffon yatangaje ko Cristiano Ronaldo,Lionel Messi na Ronaldo Luis Nazario de Lima aribo bakinnyi 3 bamugoye kurusha abandi bose yahuye nabo.
Uyu munyezamu wakiniye Juventus na Parma,yatangaje ko nubwo yahuye n’abakinnyi benshi beza,aba batatu aribo bamugoye kurusha abandi.
Yagize ati “Nahuye n’abakinnyi bakomeye benshi gusa Messi, Cristiano na Ronaldo mukuru nibo bangoye kurusha abandi ndetse nibo mbona nk’abakinnyi beza mu bo nahuye nabo.”
Buffon w’imyaka 40 yavuze ko uyu mwaka ariwo wa nyuma akina ruhago gusa wagenze nabi nabi cyane kubera ko batashoboye gutwara igikombe cya UEFA Champions League ndetseikipe y’Ubutaliyani ntibashe kubona itike yo kwerekeza mu gikombe cy’isi giteganyijwe mu Burusiya.
Abakinnyi bagoye Buffon kurusha abandi
1.Cristiano Ronaldo
2.Luis Nazario de Lima (Ronaldo)
3.Lionel Messi

Monusco yagombaga guha u Rwanda abo basilikare barwo kuko bose bemera ko ari abanyarwanda ko kandi bashaka gusubira mu gihugu cyabo ! Umunyamategeko Matimbano atuye mu mudugudu wa Kinyana, akagari ka Nunga, umurenge wa Gahanga mu karere ka Kicukiro mu mujyi wa Kigali mu bice bihana imbibe n’ akarere ka Bugesera ko mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda. Yaburanye n’imodoka ye asanzwe agendamo mu kazi.

Neymar Jr asa nk’uwasubije abafana ba Paris Saint-Germain baheruka kumuvugiriza induru, ubwo yashyiraga hanze amafoto ari kumwe n’umuhungu we,akavuga ko ariwe umuha impamvu zituma akomeza gukina umupira.
Ku cyumweru,uyu rutahizamu ukomoka muri Brazil hamwe na Lionel Messi bakinana muri PSG bavugirijwe induru n’abafana babo kubera ko batabashije kwitanga ngo bakuremo ikipe ya Real Madrid muri 1/16 cya UEFA Champions League.
Mu mukino ikipe ya PSG yatsinzemo Bordeaux ibitego 3-0,aba bagabo 2 bakor
... 
ugiriza induru kubera ko nta ruhare rwabo berekanye mu mukino iyi kipe yatsinzwemo na Madrid.
Neymar watsinze igitego muri uwo mukino wa Bordeaux ariko ntashimirwe ahubwo akavugirizwa induru, yashyize ku mbuga nkoranyambaga amafoto ye n’umwana we w’umuhungu aho yemeje ko aribo aba ashyize imbere.
Uyu mukinnyi yifotoje ari kumwe n’umuhungu we Davi Lucca w’imyaka 10, n’indi bari kumwe n’undi mwana witwa Valentin.
Neymar Jr yanditse kuri ayo mafoto ati "Nishimiye kukubona umeze neza kandi wishimye.
...
andi bigatuma nkomeza imbere.”

Inyuma yo kugurwa n’umugwi Young Africans wo mu gihugu ca Tanzania Issa Bigirimana yasezeye abakunzi b’umugwi Apr Fc yakinamwo hamwe n’abarongozi b’uyo mugwi.
Kuva aho Issa Bigirimana aguriwe n’umugwi Young Africans wo muri Tanzania, uyo mukinyi afise ubwenegihugu bubiri Aribwo Uburundi hamwe n’Urwanda kuri uyu wa kane waraye uheze igenekerezo rya 4 Mukakaro umwaka wa 2019 yanditse amajambo yo gushimira abakunzi b’umugwi Apr Fc hamwe n’abarangozi abicishije ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Facebook.
Akaba yagize ati : “Mfashe umwanya wogushimira ikipe ya APR FC mu myaka itanu ishize ndi umukinyi wayo, by’umwihariko ndashimira abayobozi kubw’urukundo mwangaragarijye mugihe tumaranye .
Ndashimra cyane abatoza bamfashijye umunsi kuwundi bakampa icyizere no kunshoboza gukina.
Ndashimira cyane abakinyi bagenzi banjye twabanye mugihe narimaze muri “Apr fc”.
Ndangijye nshimira byimazeyo abafana ba APR FC urukundo mwanyeretse kuva nahagera imyaka itanu ishize.
Nkaba nagirango mbamenyeshe yuko tutakomezanya nk’umukinyi wa Apr fc kuko ngiye gukomereza akazi ahandi..
Mukamenya y’uko Issa Bigirimana yavukiye mu Burundi mu Gatumba muri komine Mutumbuzi, yarakinye mu mugwi wo mu cicaro cambere hano iwacu ariwo LLB Sports 4 Africa akina no mu mugwi nserukiragihugu w’intamba mu rugamba w’abatarenza imyaka 20.

Ubuyobozi bw’Ishyirahamwe Nyarwanda ry’Umukino wa Volleyball, FRVB, bwahaye ishimwe abakinnyi batatu bubashimira umutahe batanze mu ikipe y’Igihugu ubwo bari bakiyikinira.
Ni umuhango wabaye ku Cyumweru tariki 22 Mutarama 2023, ubera mu Kigo cy’Urubyiruko cya Kimisigara nyuma yo gusoza shampiyona ya 2022/2023 yegukanywe na REG VC mu bagabo, mu bagore ikegukanwa na APR WVC.
Ubuyobozi bwa FRVB bwari burangajwe imbere na Mé Ngarambe Raphaël bufatanyije n’abandi bafite aho bahuriye n’umukino wa Volleyball, bwahaye ishimwe abahoze bakinira ikipe y’Igihugu mu myaka yashize.
Dusabimana Vincent uzwi nka Gasongo, yari ahagarariye bagenzi be barimo Yakan Lawrence na Karera Emile uzwi nka Dada bose baherutse gusezera mu ikipe y’Igihugu. Gasongo yahawe imyenda yanditseho nimero 11 yambaraga akiri mu kibuga, ariko ubuyobozi bumubwira ko buzahora buzirikana umusanzu we mu mukino wa Volleyball by’umwihariko mu ikipe y’Igihugu.
Dusabimana yakiniye ikipe y’Igihugu mu myaka 12 ishize, akinira REG VC, Gisagara VC n’izindi.
UMUSEKE.RW

ABAVUKANYI na bashiki bacu bo muri Sri Lanka, bambaye umwambaro kavukire, barakiriye n’igishika cinshi abashitsi 130 bari bavuye mu bihugu 19 baje kwitaba urubanza rwo kwegurira Imana inyubakwa z’ishami ryo muri iryo zinga ribereye ijisho. Umugwi w’abana wararirimvye indirimbo z’Ubwami, kandi bose barahimbawe no kuraba ibintu vyiza cane biranga imico kama yaho, barahimbarwa n’imfungurwa zaho ziryoshe cane, umuziki uryoheye ugutwi, bongera barahimbarwa no kwifatanya n’abakirisu bagenzi babo.
Ku wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 11 Nzero 2014, inyubakwa zari zubatswe n’izari zasanuwe zareguriwe Yehova, abantu 893 bakaba barakurikiranye bitonze iyo porogarama mu ndimi zitatu. Barakomye amashi menshi cane igihe Mark Sanderson wo mu Nama Nyobozi yabaza ati: “Murashaka kwegurira Yehova Imana izi nyubakwa nshasha?”
Bukeye, abantu 7.701 barakurikiranye porogarama yari igizwe n’isubiramwo ry’ivyabaye ku wa gatandatu hamwe n’insiguro iremesha yashikirijwe n’umuvukanyi Sanderson. Abavukanyi bari mu bibanza bitanu binini vyo hirya no hino mu gihugu na bo nyene barakurikiranye iyo porogarama biciye ku buhinga bwa internet. Biciye kuri ubwo buhinga, vyarashobotse ko abavukanyi na bashiki bacu bari muri ivyo bibanza vyose babonana kandi bamwe bose bakumva amajwi ya bagenzi babo igihe baba bariko bararirimba indirimbo z’Ubwami, ivyo rikaba ryari ryo rya mbere bibaye. Ico kintu c’intibagirwa caratumye vy’ukuri abavukanyi bagira “akanyamuneza kenshi.”

Ikipe ya Etincelles FC yifatiye ku gahanga Rayon Sports iyitsinda ibitego 3-2, bica intege n’ubushyuhe umukino ugomba kuyihuza na Apr mu mpera z’icyi cyumweru. Ariko ntibyabujije Rayon y’Abagore kunyagira Gatsibo.
Umukino ugitangira, Etincelles yafunguye amazamu ku munota wa 2 ku gitego cyatsinzwe na Niyonsenga Ibrahim ku mupira waruvuye muri koruneri, hanyuma Sumaila Moro ukomoka muri Ghana ashyiramo icya 2 ku munota wa 26, yongeramo ikindi ku munota wa 38 kuri penaliti, ni umupira wari ukozwe

ri gutukwa n’abakunzi bayo kubera ko atakoze ibyo bari bamwitezeho muri uyu mukino.

Urutonde:

wanda yiyemeje gushyiraho amakipe y’abagore bikurikije yuko Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru ku mugabane wa Afurika, CAF, yavuze ko mu 2023 nta kipe izakina amarushanwa yayo idafite ikipe y’abagore.

George Lewis Igaba-Ishimwe Maniraguha ni umukinnyi wavukiye mu Rwanda gusa akurira muri Norvège yageze afite imyaka ine ari naho afitiye ubwenegihugu.
Mu mwaka ushize nibwo yerekeje muri PFC Zviahel yifuzaga abakinnyi beza bataha izamu, imuha amahirwe mu mikino umunani ya Shampiyona ndetse ayitsindamo ibitego bibiri mbere yo kubona itike ya kamarampaka.
Mu mukino wabaye ku wa Gatandatu, tariki 8 Kamena 2024, ni bwo PFC Zviahel yatsinze Houst igitego 1-0 ihita ibona itike yo kuzakina Icyiciro cya Kabiri muri Ukraine.
Iyi yashinzwe mu 1993 ni ku nshuro ya mbere igiye gukina iki cyiciro ndetse ikaba ifite gahunda yo kukirenga ikazakina n’icya mbere.
George Lewis w’imyaka 24 yayigezemo avuye mu Bwongereza arekuwe na Arsenal itaramuboneye umwanya wo gukina.
Kugeza ubu nta kipe y’igihugu arakinira yaba iy’abato cyangwa abakuru haba muri Norvège cyangwa mu Rwanda. Andi makipe yakiniye ni Tromsdalen na Fram Larvik zo mu cyiciro cya gatatu muri Norvège.

Diego Costa wari uri mu gihano cy’imikino itatu yakinnye mu gihe David Luiz wavuye muri Chelsea yakinnye hagati yugarira.
Ku munota wa 35, ku mupira watewe na John Terry, Gary Cahill akawuteza agatsintsino maze Ivanovic atsinda igitego n’umutwe.
Ni igitego cya gatanu, uyu myugariro wa Chelsea atsinze muri uyu mwaka w’imikino, igitego cya mbere mu mikino y’i Burayi kuva mu 2013.
PSG yokeje igitutu Chelsea ishaka kwishyura maze ku munota wa 53, Edinson Cavani wari na ba myugariro batandatu ba Chel
... 
5 Cavani atsinze mu mikino 23 ya champions league, igitego cya gatanu mu mikino itandatu bamaze gukina.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic, Edinson Cavani, David Luiz bahushije uburyo bwari bwabazwe ku kazi gakomeye k’umunyezamu Thibaut Courtois wa Chelsea.
Umukino warangiye PSG igerageje uburyo 14, imipira irindwi ijya mu izamu rya Courtois mu gihe Chelsea yabonye uburyo bubiri, umupira umwe ujya mu izamu uvamo n’igitego.
Aya makipe yari yahuye umwaka ushize, PSG itsinda Chelsea ibitego 3-1 igeze mu rugo, Stam
...
rc des Princes harimo David Beckham, Sir Alex Ferguson, Michel Platini na Nicolas Sarkozy wabaye perezida w’u Bufaransa.
Undi mukino wabaye Shaktar Donetsk yaguye miswi na Bayern Munich, Xabi Alonso wakinaga umukino wa 100 wa champions league abona ikarita ya kabiri y’umuhondo ku munota wa 65 ku ikosa yari akoreye Taison.
Imikino yombi yo kwishyura izaba tariki ya 11 Werurwe 2015.
Champions League irakomeza kuri uyu wa Gatatu, FC Basel ikina na FC Porto naho Schalke yakire Real Madrid saa 21.45.

Zacharie Rukemba wari ushinzwe Ibitaro bya Gitwe, kuri uyu wa Kabiri yahagaritswe mu kazi, ni na bwo Ibaruwa imuhagarika yamugezeho, amakuru dufite avuga ko Ibitaro yari ashinzwe hari ikigo cyabireze kucyambura miliyoni 14Frw kirabitsinda ntibyishyura.
Ibitaro bya Gitwe biri mu Murenge wa Bweramana mu Karere ka Ruhango, bikaba bicungwa na Leta ifatanyije n’abikorera ku giti cyabo.
Bivugwa ko muri 2013 hari amasezerano ibitaro byagiranye n’ikigo tutaramenya icyo ari cyo ariko ntibyayakurikiza biba ngombwa ko baregana mu nkiko, kiriya kigo gitsinda Ibitaro bya Gitwe.
Urukiko rwategetse ko bigomba kwishyura Miliyoni Frw 14. Kuva icyo gihe ayo mafaranga ntiyishyuwe ndetse n’ubukererwe nabwo ni uko.
Ibi rero ngo byarakururanye biza kurangira Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ihagaritse Umuyobozi wa biriya Bitaro, Dr. Zacharie Rukemba.

Ikigo cy'Igihugu cy'Ibarurishamibare cyatangaje igipimo cy’ihindagurika ry’ibiciro mu kwezi Gicurasi uyu mwaka, muri rusange ibiciro byakomeje kuzamuka muri uko kwezi kuko
byiyongereyeho 14,8% ugereranyije n'ibiciro byo mu byo mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi umwaka ushize.
Bimwe mu byatumye ibiciro byiyongera muri Gicurasi 2022 nk’uko bitangazwa n'iki kigo, ni ibiciro by’ibiribwa n’ibinyobwa bidasembuye, ibiciro by’inzu, amazi, amashanyarazi, gaz n’ibindi bicanwa.
Ugereranyije ibiciro byo Mu mijyi no mu byaro, mu kwezi gushize kwa Gatanu mu mijyi ibiciro byiyongereyeho 12,6%, mu cyaro byiyongeraho 16,4% ugereranyije n’ibyo mu kwezi kwa Gatanu umwaka ushize.
Mu kiganiro yahaye RBA kuri uyu wa Gatanu, Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’inganda, Beata Habyarimana yavuze ko izamuka ry’ibiciro ku isoko mpuzamahanga ari ryo rituma ibiciro bikomeje kuzamuka mu Rwanda.

Umuyobozi w’ikipe ya Gasogi United, Kakooza Nkuriza Charles [KNC] wari uherutse gufata icyemezo cyo gukura iyi kipe mu irushanwa, yavuze ko yisubiyeho ku cyemezo yariyafashe ariko ahamya ko atazigera asubira ku kibuga.
Ku munsi wo ku wa Kane tariki ya 27 Mutarama 2022, Rayon Sports yakiriye Gasogi United inayitsinda 1-0, gusa ntabwo iyi kipe yakiriye neza ibyavuye mu mukino kuko ngo umusifuzi yanze igitego cyabo cyatsinzwe na Nkubana Marc.
Ibi n’ibyo byateye umujinya KNC avuga ko asezeye muri sh
... 
andika bamusaba ko yakwisubiraho ku cyemezo yafashe akaba yagaruka muri shampiyona.
Mu kiganiro One Sports cyatambutse ejo hashize ku wa Gatanu cyo kuri Radio1 abereye umuyobozi, KNC yavuze ko gukura ikipe muri shampiyona hari ababa babirenganiyemo nk’abakinnyi, ngo ikipe izakomeza ikine ariko ntazongera gusubira ku kibuga.
Ati “Icyo ntekereza nyuma yo kureba ingaruka bishobora kugira wenda no ku bantu batabigizemo uruhare, nk’abakinnyi ntabwo wavuga ngo wahagaritse Shampiyona muri phase aller, 
...
tuzajya tuyifasha nk’uko bisanzwe ariko kuvuga ngo ngiye kuri stade kureba umupira reka reka.”
KNC uri mu bihano yahawe na FERWAFA kubera amagambo yavuze kuri mugenzi we wa Kiyovu Sports, Juvenal Mvukiyehe ko agurisha imikino, gutesha agaciro umusifuzi wasifuye umukino ikipe abereye umuyobozi yahuymoe na Police FC aho yahanishijwe imikino 8 atagera ku kibuga harimo ibiri isubitse ndetse n’ihazabu y’ibihumbi 150, avuga ko nta bwoba afite bw’uko ashobora kongera guhanwa kuko ibyo yavuze ari ukuri.

Sergio Ramos, wari Kapiteni wa Real Madrid, yamaze gusezera iyi kipe ndetse anayishimira ibyo yamugejejeho nyuma yo kurangiza amasezerano ye ntiyemere kongera andi mashya, bikaba binugwanugwa ko ashobora guhita yerekeza mu ikipe ya PSG cyangwa Manchester United.
Uyu munyabigwi wubashywe mu bakunzi n’abafana ba Real Madrid azerekeza ku kibuga cy’imyitozo cya Valdebebas gusezera kuri uyu wa Kane aho azakora ikiganiro n’abanyamakuru ku gicamunsi.
Amasezerano ya Ramos azarangira kuwa 30 Kamena 2020 ariko ntiyemeye kuyongera kubera ko yahabwaga umwaka umwe ndetse agasabwa kugabanya 10% ku mushahara asanganwe.
Real Madrid yasohoye itangazo rigira riti “Real Madrid iratangaza ko ejo kuwa Kane tariki ya 17 Kamena saa 12:30, hazaba umuhango wo gusezera kuri kapiteni wacu Sergio Ramos uzitabirwa na Florentino Perez.”
Mu myaka 16 yambara umwenda wa Real Madrid,Ramos yakinnye imikino 671 atsinda ibitego 101 kandi ari myugariro.
Yatwaye La Liga 5, Champions League 4, ibikombe by’isi by’amakipe 4, European Super Cup 3, Copa del Rey 2, Supercopa de Espana 4.

Ni irushanwa rizwi ku izina rya “Moot Court Competition on International Humanitarian Law ” ryahuje abanyeshuri biga amategeko muri kaminuza 5 zo mu Rwanda zigisha amategeko arizo ULK ,UR ,UoK ,UNILAK na INES-Ruhengeri .
Kaminuza Yigenga ya Kigali (ULK) niyo yatsinze iri rushanwa ryateguwe N’umuryango Mpuzamahanga Utabara Imbabare (ICRC) ,iri rushanwa risanzwe ari ngaruka mwaka ,abaryitabira baba bitegura kuba abanyamategeko .
Uburyo iri rushanwa ritegurwa hategurwa ikirego abahatana bagatoranwa
... 
ushanwa n’amahirwe kuri twe nkabakiri mu ishuri kuko ni amahirwe tuba tubonye yo gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo twiga kuko biragoye ko hari ahandi wabona umwitozo nkuyu igihe ukiri mu ishuri “.
Ngoga akomeza avuga ko ikindi bungukira muri iri rushanwa ari uguhura n’inteko iburanisha ati “iyi nteko iburanisha baba ari abantu basanzwe baburanisha imanza za nyazo kandi bafite uburambe mu kazi bakora ka buri munsi biba ari umugisha kuri twe gukurikirana uko baburanisha imanza “.
Yann Fridez umuyobozi w’Um
...
 mu nshingano zacu “
Irushanwa ry’uyu mwaka ryatangiye ku wa 14 Ukwakira risozwa tariki 15 Ukwakira 2021 buri kaminuza ihagarariwe n’abanyeshuri babiri ,aho bahiganwe hatoranywamo abarushije abandi amanota aba ari nabo bahuye ku cyiciro cya nyuma .
Kaminuza ya ULK yatsinze irushanwa nk’uruhande rw’abiregura neza naho kaminuza y’ u Rwanda (UR) ku mwanya wa Kabiri nk’abatanze ikirego neza .
Abatsinze iri rushanwa bazitabira irizabera i Nairobi muri Kenya ku rwego rwa Afurika bahagarariye u Rwanda.

Abantu bashika 17 bapfuye abandi hafi 60 baraburirwa irengero, inyuma y’aho ubwato barimwo buzamiye mu mazi mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko bwa Madagascar mu gaturuturu ko kuri uyu wa mbere. Ibi vyavuzwe n’abategetsi bagenzura ibivuko.
Umukuru arongoye ibivuko muri Madagascar, Jean Edmond Randrianantenaina yavuze ko 45 kuri 130 bari muri ubwo bwato batabawe kandi abandi bakironderwa. Yavuze ko ubwo bwato bwari butwaye abantu mu buryo buteye kubiri n’amategeko.
Uwundi mutegetsi mu gisata c’ibivuko, Adrien Fabrice Ratsimbazafy, yavuze ko inyuma y’ibibazo vy’ubuhinga mu moteri, ubwo bwato bwarushijwe inguvu n’imifunda y’ikiyaga bubona kuzama.
Umurwi w’abajandarume waciye wihuta gushika ahabereye iryo sanganya kandi amatohoza yaciye atangura ku cariteye.

Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Ubumwe n’Ubwiyunge yahamagariye Abanyarwanda bose kwitabira imyiteguro y’amatora y’abadepite , inasaba abakandida kwirinda amagambo yahembera amacakubiri mu gihe bari mu bikorwa byo kwiyamamaza.
Mu itangazo Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Ubumwe n’Ubwiyunge yashyize ahagaragara ryashyizweho umukono na Perezida wayo, Musenyeri Rucyahana John, yibukije Abanyarwanda ko ari inshingano zabo guhitamo abayobozi bababereye.
Yagize ati “Kwishyiriraho ubuyobozi Abanyarwanda bihitiyemo ni ubureng
... 
o kwiyamamaza kw’abakandida ku buryo bazahitamo neza bashingiye ku migabo n’imigambi yabo.
Yasabye abarebwa n’ibikorwa by’amatora kubahiriza amahame y’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Muri iri tangazo NURC yakomeje igira iti “Komisiyo irasaba Abanyarwanda n’abakandida kurangwa n’ubwubahane, ubworoherane, gushyira imbere Ubunyarwanda n’inyungu z’Abanyarwanda bose, birinda amagambo, inyandiko n’ibindi bikorwa ibyo ari byo byose byakurura ivangura n’amacakubiri.”
Ubu butumwa bwa Komisiyo y’Ubumwe n’Ubwiyun
...
oye, ntabwo ari ukuvuga icyo undi atabasha gukorera u Rwanda, ni ukuvuga ko dukwiriye kwiyamamaza twitaka uko dushaka, tukiyamamaza tudasebanya, tukiyamamaza tudatera imvururu, tukiyamamaza tudatera amacakubiri mu Banyarwanda.”
Ingengabihe y’amatora y’abadebite iteganya ko ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza bizarangira ku wa 1 Nzeri 2017. Amatora ateganyijwe ku wa 2 Nzeri 2018 ku Banyarwanda batuye muri Diaspora naho abari imbere mu gihugu bazayazindukiramo ku wa 3 Nzeri 2018.

Umunyamakuru ukomoka mu gihugu cya Ukraine wari uzwiho kunenga cyane ubutegetsi bwa Vladimir Putin uyobora u Burusiya, yiciwe mu modoka ye ubwo yari ageze mu mujyi wa Kiev ajya ku kazi ke. Ubuyobozi bw’igihugu cya Ukraine busanga ubu ari ubwicanyi bwakozwe nyuma yo kunoza umugambi simusiga wo kumuhitana.
Ababonye ubu bwicanyi, bahamirije ibiro ntaramakuru by’Abongereza, Reuters, ko uyu munyamakuru w’imyaka 44 y’amavuko witwa Pavel Sheremet yarashwe ubwo yari mu modoka ye, bakaba barumvise ibintu
... 
e, bubashwe kandi bazwi cyane mu gihugu cya Ukraine. Yakoraga mu buryo bweruye nk’umunyamakuru unenga cyane imiyoborere ya Perezida Vladimir Putin w’u Burusiya, ndetse yanavuganiraga cyane abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwe.
Uyu munyamakuru yari akunzwe cyane kandi yubahwa cyane mu gihugu cye
Urupfu rw’uyu munyamakuru, rukomeje guhuzwa cyane n’umwuga yakoraga ndetse n’urwango yari afitiwe n’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu cy’u Burusiya. Umwaka ushize, nibwo umwe mu bakoranaga bya hafi n’uyu munyamakuru nawe
...
ri byo yazize.
Perezida wa Ukraine, Petro Poroshenko nawe yashenguwe n’uru rupfu. Mu magambo ye ati: "Iri ni ishyano riguye i Kiev. Nta kindi nabona nabasha kubivugaho, njyewe Pavel nari muzi ubwanjye. Nihanganishije inshuti n’abavandimwe be, namaze gutegeka ababishinzwe gukora iperereza byihuse..."
Iperereza rigomba gukorwa hitabwa cyane ku bafite aho bahuriye n’akazi k’itangazamakuru yakoraga, ariko hanibandwa by’umwihariko ku rwango ubutegetsi bw’igihugu cy’u Burusiya bwamwangaga.

Indwara ya Covid 19 yongeye gushibuka bushyashya ku mugabane w'Ubulayi irimo gutera igisa n'ivangura hagati y'abikingije n'abatarikingiza. Uko za leta zigerageza kugabanya umutwaro ku nzego z'ubuvuzi, ni ko zishyiraho amabwiriza atorohereza abatarakingirwa mu rwego rwo kubashishikariza gufata urukingo rwa Covid 19.
Ku wa gatanu igihugu cya Otriche cyateye indi ntambwe yo gutegeka ko abantu bose bagombye kuba bamaze kwikingiza kuva taliki ya mbere y'ukwzi kwa kabiri umwaka utaha. Aya mabwiriza arimo ararakaza abaharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu bavuga ko burimo gukandamizwa n'amategeko ashyirwaho na za leta.
Clare Daly, umwe mu badepite b'umuryango w'Ububwe bw'Ubulayi yatangaje ko mu gihugu cye hatangiye kuvuka imvugo ikurura amacakubiri hagati y'abikingije Covid 19 n'abatarayikingiza
